./  ADD  SSI=70930039,NAME=IGTUDA
TUDA     TITLE 'IGTUDA - SSCVT LOCATE ROUTINE                          *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUDA   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGTUDA    77.093'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00010000
         BALR  @09,0                                            01S0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@09                                      01S0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00014000
         GETMAIN  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @08,@01                                          01S0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@08                                        01S0001 00017000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0001 00018000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                               01S0001 00019000
*   SSNAME=R1P->SSINPUT;            /* OBTAIN THE SUBSYSTEM NAME TO     00020000
*                                      BE LOCATED IN SSNAME          */ 00021000
         L     SSNAME,SSINPUT(,R1P)                             01S0021 00022000
*   RESPECIFY                                                   01S0022 00023000
*     R1P;                          /* RELEASE R1.                   */ 00024000
*   SSCTPTR=FLCCVT->CVTJESCT->JESSSCT;/* LOAD THE ADDRESS OF THE        00025000
*                                      FIRST SSCVT.                  */ 00026000
         L     @14,FLCCVT                                       01S0023 00027000
         L     @14,CVTJESCT(,@14)                               01S0023 00028000
         L     SSCTPTR,JESSSCT(,@14)                            01S0023 00029000
*   SSLOOP=SSZERO;                  /* INITIALIZE LOOP CONTROL TO       00030000
*                                      FORCE INITIAL SEARCH.         */ 00031000
         SLR   SSLOOP,SSLOOP                                    01S0024 00032000
*   SSRETREG=SSZERO;                /* INITIALIZE TO INDICATE THAT NO   00033000
*                                      SSCVT FOR THIS NAME EXIST     */ 00034000
         SLR   SSRETREG,SSRETREG                                01S0025 00035000
*/*                                                                  */ 00036000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00037000
*/*                                                                  */ 00038000
*/*   CHECK FOR AT LEAST ONE SUBSYSTEM                               */ 00039000
*/*                                                                  */ 00040000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00041000
*/*                                                                  */ 00042000
*                                                               01S0026 00043000
*   IF SSCTPTRÂ¬=SSZERO THEN         /* AT LEAST ONE SSVCT EXIST.     */ 00044000
         LTR   SSCTPTR,SSCTPTR                                  01S0026 00045000
         BZ    @RF00026                                         01S0026 00046000
*     DO UNTIL SSLOOP=SSTERM;       /* UNTIL NEXT POINTER = ZERO        00047000
*                                      INDICATING THIS IS THE LAST      00048000
*                                      SSCVT, OR A MATCH IS FOUND    */ 00049000
@DL00027 DS    0H                                               01S0028 00050000
*       IF SSNAME=SSCTSNAM THEN     /* COMPARE SEARCH NAME WITH THE     00051000
*                                      NAME IN THE SSCVT.            */ 00052000
         CL    SSNAME,SSCTSNAM(,SSCTPTR)                        01S0028 00053000
         BNE   @RF00028                                         01S0028 00054000
*         DO;                                                   01S0029 00055000
*           SSRETREG=SSCTPTR;       /* A MATCHING SUBSYSTEM NAME HAS    00056000
*                                      BEEN FOUND, AND R15 = THE        00057000
*                                      ADDRESS OF THE SSCVT FOR THAT    00058000
*                                      SUBSYSTEM.                    */ 00059000
         LR    SSRETREG,SSCTPTR                                 01S0030 00060000
*           SSLOOP=SSTERM;          /* TERMINATE SEARCH LOOP         */ 00061000
         LA    SSLOOP,8                                         01S0031 00062000
*         END;                                                  01S0032 00063000
*                                                               01S0032 00064000
*/*                                                                  */ 00065000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00066000
*/*                                                                  */ 00067000
*/*   IF NOT DETERMINE IF ANY MORE                                   */ 00068000
*/*                                                                  */ 00069000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00070000
*/*                                                                  */ 00071000
*                                                               01S0033 00072000
*       ELSE                                                    01S0033 00073000
*         DO;                                                   01S0033 00074000
         B     @RC00028                                         01S0033 00075000
@RF00028 DS    0H                                               01S0034 00076000
*           IF SSCTSCTA=SSZERO THEN /* THIS IS THE LAST SSCVT.       */ 00077000
         L     @14,SSCTSCTA(,SSCTPTR)                           01S0034 00078000
         LTR   @14,@14                                          01S0034 00079000
         BNZ   @RF00034                                         01S0034 00080000
*             DO;                                               01S0035 00081000
*               SSLOOP=SSTERM;      /* FORCE TERMINATION OF DO LOOP  */ 00082000
         LA    SSLOOP,8                                         01S0036 00083000
*             END;                                              01S0037 00084000
*           ELSE                                                01S0038 00085000
*             DO;                                               01S0038 00086000
         B     @RC00034                                         01S0038 00087000
@RF00034 DS    0H                                               01S0039 00088000
*               SSCTPTR=SSCTSCTA;   /* OBTAIN POINTER TO THE NEXT       00089000
*                                      SSCVT.                        */ 00090000
         L     SSCTPTR,SSCTSCTA(,SSCTPTR)                       01S0039 00091000
*             END;                                              01S0040 00092000
*         END;                                                  01S0041 00093000
@RC00034 DS    0H                                               01S0042 00094000
*     END;                                                      01S0042 00095000
*                                                               01S0042 00096000
@RC00028 DS    0H                                               01S0042 00097000
@DE00027 C     SSLOOP,@CF00043                                  01S0042 00098000
         BNE   @DL00027                                         01S0042 00099000
*/*                                                                  */ 00100000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00101000
*/*                                                                  */ 00102000
*/*   RETURN TO CALLER                                               */ 00103000
*/*                                                                  */ 00104000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00105000
*/*                                                                  */ 00106000
*                                                               01S0043 00107000
*   RETURN CODE(SSRETREG);          /* RETURN TO CALLING ROUTINE     */ 00108000
@RF00026 LR    @12,@15                                          01S0043 00109000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0043 00110000
         LR    @01,@08                                          01S0043 00111000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00112000
         LR    @15,@12                                          01S0043 00113000
         L     @14,12(,@13)                                     01S0043 00114000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                  01S0043 00115000
         BR    @14                                              01S0043 00116000
         EJECT                                                          00117000
*                                                               01S0044 00118000
*/*                                                                  */ 00119000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00120000
*/*                                                                  */ 00121000
*/*   MODULE PATCH AREA                                              */ 00122000
*/*                                                                  */ 00123000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00124000
*/*                                                                  */ 00125000
*                                                               01S0044 00126000
*   DECLARE                                                     01S0044 00127000
*     ZAPPATCH CHAR(*)              /* MODULE PATCH AREA             */ 00128000
*         INTERNAL STATIC LOCAL GENERATED;                      01S0044 00129000
*   GENERATE DATA DEFS(ZAPPATCH);                               01S0045 00130000
*                                                               01S0045 00131000
*/*                                                                  */ 00132000
*/* **************************************************************** */ 00133000
*/*                                                                  */ 00134000
*/*   REGISTER DECLARATIONS                                          */ 00135000

*/* **************************************************************** */ 00137000
*/*                                                                  */ 00138000
*                                                               01S0046 00139000
*   DECLARE                                                     01S0046 00140000
*     R1P REG(1),                   /* GENERAL REGISTER ONE - ADDRESS   00141000
*                                      OF THE SUBSYSTEM NAME TO BE      00142000
*                                      SEARCHED FOR ON THE SSCVT        00143000
*                                      CHAIN (INPUT)                 */ 00144000
*     SSDATA REG(08)                /* POINTER TO APNP.              */ 00145000
*         RSTD,                                                 01S0046 00146000
*     SSCODE REG(09)                /* BASE REGISTER FOR THIS MODULE */ 00147000
*         RSTD,                                                 01S0046 00148000
*     SSLOOP REG(10)                /* LOOP CONTROL REGISTER         */ 00149000
*         RSTD,                                                 01S0046 00150000
*     SSNAME REG(11)                /* SUBSYSTEM SEARCH NAME         */ 00151000
*         RSTD,                                                 01S0046 00152000
*     SSRETREG REG(15);             /* GENERAL REGISTER FIFTEEN -       00153000
*                                      ADDRESS OF THE SSCVT IF FOUND    00154000
*                                      (OUTPUT) OR - ZEROS IF THE       00155000
*                                      SSCVT WAS NOT FOUND (OUTPUT)  */ 00156000
*   END IGTUDA                                                  01S0047 00157000
*                                                               01S0047 00158000
*/* THE FOLLOWING INCLUDE STATEMENTS WERE FOUND IN THIS PROGRAM.     */ 00159000

@EL00001 DS    0H                                               01S0047 00167000
@EF00001 L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0047 00168000

         END   IGTUDA,(C'PLS0220',0701,77093)                           01176000
./  ADD  SSI=70930040,NAME=IGTUEA
TUEA     TITLE 'IGTUEA - SYSTEM  ATTACH ROUTINE.                       *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
         MACRO                                                          00003000
&LABEL   IGTDGSV &R,&LV=,&SP=,&INITIAL=YES                              00004000
         L      APCTPTR,0(R1P)         SET ADDRESS OF THE APCT.         00005000
         IGTYGSV &R,INITIAL=&INITIAL,LV=&LV,SP=&SP                      00006000
         MEND                                                           00007000
IGTUEA   CSECT ,                                                01S0002 00008000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0002 00009000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0002 00010000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0002 00011000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0002 00012000
         DC    C'IGTUEA    77.093'                              01S0002 00013000
         DROP  @15                                                      00014000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0002 00015000
         BALR  @07,0                                            01S0002 00016000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0002 00017000
         USING @PSTART,@07                                      01S0002 00018000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0002 00019000
         IGTDGSV  R,LV=(0)                                              00020000
         LR    @06,@01                                          01S0002 00021000
         USING @DATD,@06                                        01S0002 00022000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0002 00023000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0002 00024000
         ST    @06,8(,@13)                                      01S0002 00025000
         LR    @13,@06                                          01S0002 00026000
         MVC   @PC00001(8),0(@01)                               01S0002 00027000
*/*                                                                  */ 00028000
*/* END OF APCV                                                      */ 00029000
*/*                                                                  */ 00030000
*                                                               01S0016 00031000
*   R2P=RTNPTR;                     /* SET R2 TO THE ROUTINE ADDRESS */ 00032000
         L     @15,@PC00001+4                                   01S0016 00033000
         L     R2P,RTNPTR(,@15)                                 01S0016 00034000
*   R1P=R1P+8;                      /* BUMP R1 PAST THE FIRST  STUFF.*/ 00035000
         LA    R1P,8(,R1P)                                      01S0017 00036000
*   CALL ROUTINE;                   /* GO TO THE ROUTINE.            */ 00037000
         LR    @15,R2P                                          01S0018 00038000
         BALR  @14,@15                                          01S0018 00039000
*   RETURN CODE(R15P);              /* PASS THE RETURNCODE BACK 01S0019 00040000
*                                      IGTXEPLG                      */ 00041000
         LR    @03,@15                                          01S0019 00042000
         L     @13,4(,@13)                                      01S0019 00043000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0019 00044000
         LR    @01,@06                                          01S0019 00045000
         IGTYFSV  R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00046000
         LR    @15,@03                                          01S0019 00047000
         L     @14,12(,@13)                                     01S0019 00048000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                  01S0019 00049000
         BR    @14                                              01S0019 00050000
*                                                               01S0020 00051000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00052000
*   /*                                                               */ 00053000
*   /* SYSTEM DECLARES                                               */ 00054000
*   /*                                                               */ 00055000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00056000
*                                                               01S0020 00057000
*   DECLARE                         /* COMMON VARIABLES              */ 00058000
*     I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                    01S0020 00059000
*     I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                    01S0020 00060000
*     I031P PTR(31) BASED,                                      01S0020 00061000
*     I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                    01S0020 00062000
*     I015P PTR(15) BASED,                                      01S0020 00063000
*     I008P PTR(8) BASED,                                       01S0020 00064000
*     I001C CHAR(1) BASED;                                      01S0020 00065000
*                                                               01S0021 00066000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00067000
*   /*                                                               */ 00068000
*   /* MODULE PATCH AREA                                             */ 00069000
*   /*                                                               */ 00070000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00071000
*                                                               01S0021 00072000
*   DCL                                                         01S0021 00073000
*     APPATCH CHAR(*) INT STATIC LOCAL GEND;                    01S0021 00074000
*   GENERATE DATA DEFS(APPATCH);                                01S0022 00075000
*                                                               01S0023 00076000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00077000
*   /*                                                               */ 00078000
*   /* GENERAL REGISTER DECLARES                                     */ 00079000
*   /*                                                               */ 00080000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00081000
*                                                               01S0023 00082000
*   DCL                                                         01S0023 00083000
*     R0F FIXED(31) REG(0),                                     01S0023 00084000
*     R0P PTR(24) REG(0),                                       01S0023 00085000
*     R0RSTD PTR(31) REG(0),                                    01S0023 00086000
*     R1F FIXED(31) REG(1),                                     01S0023 00087000
*     R1P PTR(24) REG(1),                                       01S0023 00088000
*     R1RSTD PTR(31) REG(1),                                    01S0023 00089000
*     R2F FIXED(31) REG(2),                                     01S0023 00090000
*     R2P PTR(24) REG(2),                                       01S0023 00091000
*     R2RSTD PTR(31) REG(2),                                    01S0023 00092000
*     R3F FIXED(31) REG(3),                                     01S0023 00093000
*     R3P PTR(24) REG(3),                                       01S0023 00094000
*     R3RSTD PTR(31) REG(3),                                    01S0023 00095000
*     R4F FIXED(31) REG(4),                                     01S0023 00096000
*     R4P PTR(24) REG(4),                                       01S0023 00097000
*     R4RSTD PTR(31) REG(4),                                    01S0023 00098000
*     R5F FIXED(31) REG(5),                                     01S0023 00099000
*     R5P PTR(24) REG(5),                                       01S0023 00100000
*     R5RSTD PTR(31) REG(5),                                    01S0023 00101000
*     R6F FIXED(31) REG(6),                                     01S0023 00102000
*     R6P PTR(24) REG(6),                                       01S0023 00103000
*     R6RSTD PTR(31) REG(6),                                    01S0023 00104000
*     R7F FIXED(31) REG(7),                                     01S0023 00105000
*     R7P PTR(24) REG(7),                                       01S0023 00106000
*     R7RSTD PTR(31) REG(7),                                    01S0023 00107000
*     R8F FIXED(31) REG(8),                                     01S0023 00108000
*     R8P PTR(24) REG(8),                                       01S0023 00109000
*     R8RSTD PTR(31) REG(8),                                    01S0023 00110000
*     R9F FIXED(31) REG(9),                                     01S0023 00111000

         END   IGTUEA,(C'PLS0223',0701,77093)                           00773000
./  ADD  SSI=70930041,NAME=IGTUFA
TUFA     TITLE 'IGTUFA -- INSURE SUBCHANNEL INACTIVE                   *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUFA   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL2(@EP00001-@MAINENT)                                   00007000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00008000
         DC    C'IGTUFA    77.093'                              01S0001 00009000
IGTUFA01 DS    0H                                               01S0001 00010000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00011000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00012000
         DC    AL2(@EP00096-IGTUFA01)                                   00013000
         ENTRY IGTUFA01                                                 00014000
         DROP  @15                                                      00015000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00016000
         BALR  @07,0                                            01S0001 00017000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00018000
         USING @PSTART,@07                                      01S0001 00019000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00020000
         IGTYGSV  R,LV=(0)                                              00021000
         LR    @06,@01                                          01S0001 00022000
         USING @DATD,@06                                        01S0001 00023000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00024000
         LM    @15,@01,16(@13)                                  01S0001 00025000
         ST    @06,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00026000
         LR    @13,@06                                          01S0001 00027000
         AH    @15,4(,@15)                                      01S0001 00028000
         BR    @15                                              01S0001 00029000
@EP00001 MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                               01S0001 00030000
*                                      1 EQUALS 0.01 SECONDS. VALUE     00031000
*                                      SET TO 30-SECONDS.            */ 00032000
*                                                               01S0094 00033000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00034000
*   /*                                                               */ 00035000
*   /* MAIN ENTRY. SIGNIFY INITIAL CALL AND GO TO STANDARD PROCESSING*/ 00036000
*   /* ROUTINE.                                                      */ 00037000
*   /*                                                               */ 00038000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00039000
*                                                               01S0094 00040000
*   DENTRY=CINITIAL;                /* SHOW INITIAL (USER) CALL      */ 00041000
         SLR   DENTRY,DENTRY                                    01S0094 00042000
*   GOTO START;                     /* GO TO MAINLINE PROCESSING     */ 00043000
*                                                               01S0095 00044000
         B     START                                            01S0095 00045000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00046000
*   /*                                                               */ 00047000
*   /* SECONDARY ENTRY. ENTERED BY IGTUFA (THIS PGM) WHEN I/O        */ 00048000
*   /* CURRENTLY ACTIVE. CONTROL RECEIVED UNDER A SUBTASK. SIGNIFY   */ 00049000
*   /* SUBTASK CALL AND FALL THROUGH TO STANDARD PROCESSING ROUTINE. */ 00050000
*   /*                                                               */ 00051000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00052000
*                                                               01S0096 00053000
*IGTUFA01:                          /* INTERNAL USE ONLY ENTRY       */ 00054000
*   ENTRY(DAPUB);                   /* INPUT IS APUB                 */ 00055000
@EP00096 MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                               01S0096 00056000
*   DENTRY=CSUBTASK;                /* SHOW RUNNING UNDER SUBTASK    */ 00057000
         LA    DENTRY,4                                         01S0097 00058000
*   TCBECBNV=BON;                   /* DO NOT VALIDITY CHECK    01S0098 00059000
*                                      END-OF-TASK ECB.              */ 00060000
         L     @02,TCBPTR                                       01S0098 00061000
         OI    TCBECBNV(@02),B'00000100'                        01S0098 00062000
*START:                                                         01S0099 00063000
*                                                               01S0099 00064000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00065000
*   /*                                                               */ 00066000
*   /* SCAN APIO CHAIN AND LOCATE ACTIVE I/O FOR THE INPUT APUB. IF  */ 00067000
*   /* NONE EXISTS, RETURN TO THE CALLER.                            */ 00068000
*   /*                                                               */ 00069000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00070000
*                                                               01S0099 00071000
*   RFY                                                         01S0099 00072000
*     RAPUBPTR RSTD;                /* POINTER TO APUB               */ 00073000
START    DS    0H                                               01S0100 00074000
*   RAPUBPTR=ADDR(DAPUB);           /* POINT TO INPUT APUB           */ 00075000
         L     RAPUBPTR,@PC00001                                01S0100 00076000
*   RFY                                                         01S0101 00077000
*     APUB BASED(RAPUBPTR);         /* TELL COMPILER OF POINTER      */ 00078000
*   RFY                                                         01S0102 00079000
*     RUCBPTR RSTD;                 /* POINTER TO UCB                */ 00080000
*   RUCBPTR=APUBUCB;                /* UCB TO QUIESCE                */ 00081000
         L     RUCBPTR,APUBUCB(,RAPUBPTR)                       01S0103 00082000
*RETRY:                             /* RE-ENTRY AFTER STIMER WAIT    */ 00083000
*   RFY                                                         01S0104 00084000
*     APIOPTR RSTD;                 /* APIO SCAN POINTER             */ 00085000
RETRY    DS    0H                                               01S0105 00086000
*   RFY                                                         01S0105 00087000
*     APIO BASED(APIOPTR);          /* TELL COMPILER                 */ 00088000
*   APIOPTR=APCTAPIO;               /* FIRST APIO TO CHECK           */ 00089000
         L     APIOPTR,APCTAPIO(,APCTPTR)                       01S0106 00090000
*   DO                              /* SCAN APIOS UNTIL EITHER       */ 00091000
*         WHILE((APIOPTRÂ¬=0)&       /* END OF CHAN, OR               */ 00092000
*         (APIOACTV=TSOFF|          /* AN ACTIVE APIO FOR THE INPUT  */ 00093000
*         RUCBPTRÂ¬=IOSUCB));        /* APUB IS FOUND.                */ 00094000
         B     @DE00107                                         01S0107 00095000
@DL00107 DS    0H                                               01S0108 00096000
*     APIOPTR=APIOAPIO;             /* NEXT APIO                     */ 00097000
         L     APIOPTR,APIOAPIO(,APIOPTR)                       01S0108 00098000
*   END;                            /* CONTINUE CHAIN SCAN           */ 00099000
@DE00107 LTR   APIOPTR,APIOPTR                                  01S0109 00100000
         BZ    @DC00107                                         01S0109 00101000
         CLI   APIOACTV(APIOPTR),0                              01S0109 00102000
         BE    @DL00107                                         01S0109 00103000
         C     RUCBPTR,IOSUCB(,APIOPTR)                         01S0109 00104000
         BNE   @DL00107                                         01S0109 00105000
@DC00107 DS    0H                                               01S0110 00106000
         EJECT                                                          00107000
*                                                               01S0110 00108000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00109000
*   /*                                                               */ 00110000
*   /* IF NO ACTIVE APIO'S, RETURN TO CALLER. IF ACTIVE AND ALREADY  */ 00111000
*   /* RUNNING UNDER A SUBTASK (DENTRY=CSUBTASK), WAIT 1 SECOND AND  */ 00112000
*   /* GO TO 'RETRY' TO RESCAN THE QUEUE. IF ACTIVE AND THIS IS THE  */ 00113000
*   /* INITIAL PASS, ATTACH THIS ROUTINE AS A SUBTASK. WHEN CONTROL  */ 00114000
*   /* IS RETURNED, NO APIO ENTRIES ARE ACTIVE.                      */ 00115000
*   /*                                                               */ 00116000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00117000
*                                                               01S0110 00118000
*   IF APIOPTRÂ¬=0 THEN              /* IF ACTIVE APIO FOUND --       */ 00119000
         SLR   @11,@11                                          01S0110 00120000
         CR    APIOPTR,@11                                      01S0110 00121000
         BE    @RF00110                                         01S0110 00122000
*     IF DENTRYÂ¬=CINITIAL THEN      /* IF RUNNING UNDER SUBTASK,     */ 00123000
         CR    DENTRY,@11                                       01S0111 00124000
         BE    @RF00111                                         01S0111 00125000
*       DO;                         /* THEN WAIT A BIT.              */ 00126000
*         DO UNTIL(APIOACTV=TSOFF|  /* LOOP ON CHECKING FOR THIS     */ 00127000
*               RUCBPTRÂ¬=IOSUCB);   /* APIO NOT BEING ACTIVE FOR THIS   00128000
*                                      APUB/UCB.                     */ 00129000
@DL00113 DS    0H                                               01S0114 00130000
*           GEN(STIMER WAIT,BINTVL=LWAITTME)                    01S0114 00131000
*           REFS(R0F,R1F,R15F,LWAITTME);                        01S0114 00132000
         STIMER WAIT,BINTVL=LWAITTME                                    00133000
*         END;                      /* THIS APIO FINISHED, SO        */ 00134000
@DE00113 CLI   APIOACTV(APIOPTR),0                              01S0115 00135000
         BE    @DC00113                                         01S0115 00136000
         C     RUCBPTR,IOSUCB(,APIOPTR)                         01S0115 00137000
         BE    @DL00113                                         01S0115 00138000
@DC00113 DS    0H                                               01S0116 00139000
*         GOTO RETRY;               /* RETRY APIO SCAN.              */ 00140000
         B     RETRY                                            01S0116 00141000
*       END;                        /* SUBTASK PROCESSING COMPLETE.  */ 00142000
*     ELSE                          /* IF USER INTERFACE ENTRY       */ 00143000
*       DO;                         /* (CINITIAL), THEN ATTACH.      */ 00144000
@RF00111 DS    0H                                               01S0119 00145000
*         GEN(MVC   DATTACH,LATTACH)                            01S0119 00146000
*         REFS(LATTACH) SETS(DATTACH);/* INITIALIZE ATTACH LIST      */ 00147000
         MVC   DATTACH,LATTACH                                          00148000
*         GEN(MVC   DPARMS,LPARMS)                              01S0120 00149000
*         REFS(LPARMS) SETS(DPARMS);/* INITIALIZE PARAMETER LIST     */ 00150000
*                                                               01S0120 00151000
         MVC   DPARMS,LPARMS                                            00152000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00153000
*         /*                                                         */ 00154000
*         /* ATTACH IGTUEA. THIS PGM WILL ESTABLISH THE VPSS         */ 00155000
*         /* ENVIRONMENT AND CALL IGTUFA01.                          */ 00156000
*         /*                                                         */ 00157000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00158000
*                                                               01S0121 00159000
*         RFY                                                   01S0121 00160000
*           RDCBPTR RSTD;           /* MODULE IN LPALIB SO POINT     */ 00161000
*         RDCBPTR=CVTLINK;          /* TO SYSTEM LIBRARY DCB.        */ 00162000
         L     @11,CVTPTR                                       01S0122 00163000
         L     RDCBPTR,CVTLINK(,@11)                            01S0122 00164000
*         DECB=0;                   /* END-OF-TASK ECB CLEARED.      */ 00165000
         SLR   @11,@11                                          01S0123 00166000
         ST    @11,DECB                                         01S0123 00167000
*         RFY                                                   01S0124 00168000
*           R1P RSTD;               /* RETURNED TCB ADDRESS          */ 00169000
*         GEN REFS(RDCBPTR,DECB,RAPUBPTR,APCTPTR) SETS(R0F,R1F,R15F,    00170000
*             DATTACH,DECB,DPARMS) NOFLOWS NOEXIT;              01S0125 00171000
*                                   /*                                  00172000
         ATTACH DCB=(RDCBPTR),     IGTUEA IN LPA (LINKLIB DCB)         *00173000
               PARAM=((APCTPTR),,(RAPUBPTR)), INPUT PARMS              *00174000
               VL=1,               VARIABLE INPUT LIST                 *00175000
               ECB=DECB,           END-OF-TASK ECB                     *00176000
               SF=(E,DATTACH),     SYSTEM PARM LIST WORKAREA           *00177000
               MF=(E,DPARMS)       USER PARM LIST WORKAREA              00178000
*         DTCBPTR=R1P;              /* SAVE SUBTASK TCB ADDRESS      */ 00179000
         ST    R1P,DTCBPTR                                      01S0126 00180000
*         DO;                       /* IGTYWAIT ECB(DECB)LONG(YES)   */ 00181000
*           RFY                                                 01S0128 00182000
*            (GPR00F,                                           01S0128 00183000
*             GPR01P) RSTD;         /* REGISTERS USED                */ 00184000
*           DCL                                                 01S0129 00185000
*             BIT0009X BIT(8) BASED(ADDR(DECB));/* OVERLAY BYTE-0 OF    00186000
*                                      ECB                           */ 00187000
*           IF BIT0009X(2)='0'B THEN/* IF ECB NOT ALREADY POSTED     */ 00188000
         LA    @11,DECB                                         01S0130 00189000
         TM    BIT0009X(@11),B'01000000'                        01S0130 00190000
         BNZ   @RF00130                                         01S0130 00191000
*             DO;                   /* THEN ISSUE WAIT SVC           */ 00192000
*               GPR01P=ADDR(DECB);  /* POINT TO ECB                  */ 00193000
         LR    GPR01P,@11                                       01S0132 00194000
*               GPR00F=1|'80000000'X;/* WAIT COUNT                   */ 00195000
         L     GPR00F,@CF02392                                  01S0133 00196000
*               SVC(1);             /* WAIT FOR ECB POSTING          */ 00197000
         SVC   1                                                01S0134 00198000
*             END;                  /* ECB WAIT COMPLETE             */ 00199000
*           RFY                                                 01S0136 00200000
*            (GPR00F,                                           01S0136 00201000
*             GPR01P) UNRSTD;       /* FINISHED WITH REGISTERS       */ 00202000
@RF00130 DS    0H                                               01S0137 00203000
*         END;                      /* ECB WAIT COMPLETE WAIT FOR       00204000
*                                      SUBTASK END                   */ 00205000
*         GEN(DETACH DTCBPTR)                                   01S0138 00206000
*         REFS(DTCBPTR);            /* DELETE THE SUBTASK            */ 00207000
         DETACH DTCBPTR                                                 00208000
*       END;                        /* UCB NOT LONGER ACTIVE         */ 00209000
*                                                               01S0139 00210000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00211000
*   /*                                                               */ 00212000
*   /* ALL ACTIVE I/O FOR THIS APUB IS COMPLETE. RETURN TO THE       */ 00213000
*   /* CALLER.                                                       */ 00214000
*   /*                                                               */ 00215000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00216000
*                                                               01S0140 00217000
*   RETURN CODE(0);                 /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 00218000
@RF00110 L     @13,4(,@13)                                      01S0140 00219000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0140 00220000
         LR    @01,@06                                          01S0140 00221000

         EJECT                                                          00227000

@ENDDATA EQU   *                                                        02643000
         END   IGTUFA,(C'PLS0227',0701,77093)                           02644000
./  ADD  SSI=70930042,NAME=IGTUHA
TUHA     TITLE 'IGTUHA - ADD AN APUB TO THE SHARED QUEUE.              *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUHA   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGTUHA    77.093'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00010000
         BALR  @07,0                                            01S0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@07                                      01S0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00014000
         IGTYGSV  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @06,@01                                          01S0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@06                                        01S0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0001 00019000
         ST    @06,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@06                                          01S0001 00021000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                               01S0001 00022000
*                                                               01S0015 00023000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00024000
*   /*                                                               */ 00025000
*   /* SEE IF THIS ONE IS ALREADY ON THE SHARED CHAIN.               */ 00026000
*   /*                                                               */ 00027000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00028000
*                                                               01S0016 00029000
*   APUBPTR=APCTUBIS;               /* POINTER TO FIRST SHARED APUB. */ 00030000
         L     APUBPTR,APCTUBIS(,APCTPTR)                       01S0016 00031000
*   DO WHILE APUBPTRÂ¬=0             /* IF THIS STOPS LOOP, NOT ON       00032000
*                                      CHAIN                         */ 00033000
*         &APUBPTRÂ¬=ADDR(INPARM);   /* THIS STOP, IT IS ON THE CHAIN.*/ 00034000
         B     @DE00017                                         01S0017 00035000
@DL00017 DS    0H                                               01S0018 00036000
*     APUBPTR=APUBNXIO;             /* GO TO NEXT ONE ON THE CHAIN.  */ 00037000
         L     APUBPTR,APUBNXIO(,APUBPTR)                       01S0018 00038000
*   END;                                                        01S0019 00039000
@DE00017 LTR   APUBPTR,APUBPTR                                  01S0019 00040000
         BZ    @DC00017                                         01S0019 00041000
         L     @11,@PC00001                                     01S0019 00042000
         CR    APUBPTR,@11                                      01S0019 00043000
         BNE   @DL00017                                         01S0019 00044000
@DC00017 DS    0H                                               01S0020 00045000
*   IF APUBPTR=0 THEN               /* IF IT WASN'T ON THE LOOP THEN */ 00046000
         LTR   APUBPTR,APUBPTR                                  01S0020 00047000
         BNZ   @RF00020                                         01S0020 00048000
*     DO;                           /* ADD IT.                       */ 00049000
*       ADDR(INPARM)->APUBNXIO      /* INIT. CHAIN PTR IN APUB TO BE */ 00050000
*           =APCTUBIS;              /* ADDED.                        */ 00051000
         L     @11,@PC00001                                     01S0022 00052000
         L     @03,APCTUBIS(,APCTPTR)                           01S0022 00053000
         ST    @03,APUBNXIO(,@11)                               01S0022 00054000
*       APCTUBIS=                   /* SET TOP PTR TO THE NEWLY ADDED*/ 00055000
*           ADDR(INPARM);           /* APUB.                         */ 00056000
         ST    @11,APCTUBIS(,APCTPTR)                           01S0023 00057000
*       RC=0;                       /* RC = 0 SAYS I DID IT FOR HIM. */ 00058000
         SLR   RC,RC                                            01S0024 00059000
*     END;                                                      01S0025 00060000
*   ELSE                                                        01S0026 00061000
*     RC=4;                         /* RC = 4 SAYS I DIDN'T CAUSE IT    00062000
*                                      WAS ALREADY DONE.             */ 00063000
         B     @RC00020                                         01S0026 00064000
@RF00020 LA    RC,4                                             01S0026 00065000
*   RETURN CODE(RC);                /* IGTXEPLG                      */ 00066000
@RC00020 L     @13,4(,@13)                                      01S0027 00067000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0027 00068000
         LR    @01,@06                                          01S0027 00069000
         IGTYFSV  R,LV=(0),A=(1)                                        00070000
         LR    @15,@02                                          01S0027 00071000
         L     @14,12(,@13)                                     01S0027 00072000
         LM    @00,@12,20(@13)                                  01S0027 00073000
         BR    @14                                              01S0027 00074000

TUHB     TITLE 'IGTUHB - REMOVE AN APUB FROM THE SHARED QUEUE.         *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUHB   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGTUHB    77.093'                              01S0001 00008000

         LR    @13,@06                                          01S0001 00021000
         MVC   @PC00001(4),0(@01)                               01S0001 00022000
*   PREVIOUS=0;                     /* UNIT PTR TO PREVIOUS APUB.    */ 00023000

*   APUBPTR=APCTUBIS;               /* PTR TO FIRST APUB.            */ 00025000

*     PREVIOUS=APUBPTR;             /* UPDATE PTR TO PREVIOUS.       */ 00031000

@DC00019 DS    0H                                               01S0023 00041000

./  ADD  SSI=70930044,NAME=IGTUJA
TUJA     TITLE 'IGTUJA - QUIESCE I/O UTILITY ROUTINE.                  *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUJA   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGTUJA    77.093'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  STM   @14,@12,12(@13)                                  01S0001 00010000
         BALR  @07,0                                            01S0001 00011000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00012000
         USING @PSTART,@07                                      01S0001 00013000
         L     @00,@SIZDATD                                     01S0001 00014000
         IGTYGSV  R,LV=(0)                                              00015000
         LR    @06,@01                                          01S0001 00016000
         USING @DATD,@06                                        01S0001 00017000
         ST    @13,@SA00001+4                                   01S0001 00018000
         LM    @00,@01,20(@13)                                  01S0001 00019000
         ST    @06,8(,@13)                                      01S0001 00020000
         LR    @13,@06                                          01S0001 00021000
*   I=R1P;                          /* INDEX FOR CASE.               */ 00022000
         LR    I,R1P                                            01S0147 00023000
*   IF I>MAXCASE THEN               /* TEST FOR VALID FUNCTION CODE. */ 00024000
         CH    I,MAXCASE                                        01S0148 00025000
         BNH   @RF00148                                         01S0148 00026000
*     CALL APCVZDWT(IGT220I,        /* IF FUNCTION NOT YET IMPLEMENT,*/ 00027000
*         14,APCTSSID,4,            /* OUTPUT ERROR MESSAGE.         */ 00028000
*         35,'08',2);                                           01S0149 00029000
         MVC   @AL00001(28),@AL00149                            01S0149 00030000
         LA    @15,APCTSSID(,APCTPTR)                           01S0149 00031000
         ST    @15,@AL00001+8                                   01S0149 00032000
         L     @15,APCTZDWT(,APCTPTR)                           01S0149 00033000
         LA    @01,@AL00001                                     01S0149 00034000
         BALR  @14,@15                                          01S0149 00035000
*   ELSE                                                        01S0150 00036000
*     DO;                                                       01S0150 00037000
         B     @RC00148                                         01S0150 00038000
@RF00148 DS    0H                                               01S0151 00039000
*       GEN(MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP);/* GET INTO SUPERVISOR STATE. */ 00040000
         MODESET KEY=ZERO,MODE=SUP                                      00041000
*       DO;                         /* CASE(I)NAMES(FC1,FC2,FC3)     */ 00042000
*         DCL                                                   01S0153 00043000
*           CL0001@ LABEL BASED(CP0001@(I)) VALUERANGE(FC1,FC2,FC3);    00044000
*                                   /* BRANCH TARGET                 */ 00045000
*         DCL                                                   01S0154 00046000
*           CP0001@(3) PTR(31) INIT(ADDR(FC1),ADDR(FC2),ADDR(FC3));     00047000
*         GOTO CL0001@;             /* BRANCH TO SELECTED CASE       */ 00048000
         LR    @03,I                                            01S0155 00049000
         SLA   @03,2                                            01S0155 00050000
         L     @03,CP0001@-4(@03)                               01S0155 00051000
         BR    @03                                              01S0155 00052000
*FC1:                                                           01S0156 00053000
*         DO;                       /* SUBCASE PROCESS RESET QUIESCE    00054000
*                                      BIT.                          */ 00055000
FC1      DS    0H                                               01S0157 00056000
*/*  THIS CODE IS RESPONSIBLE FOR RESETTING THE QUIESCE BIT AND 01S0157 00057000
*    SIMULATING AN INTERRUPT SO THAT NEW CHANNEL PROGRAMS MAY BE        00058000
*    STARTED ON THE AFFECTED SUBCHANNEL.  IT USES THE IOSGEN MACRO      00059000
*    FOR BOTH PURPOSES.                                              */ 00060000
*                                                               01S0157 00061000
*           RFY                                                 01S0157 00062000
*             APUB BASED(APUBPTR);  /* POINTER TO THE APUB.          */ 00063000
*           RFY                                                 01S0158 00064000
*             APUBPTR RSTD;         /* DONT USE THIS REG FOR ANYTHING*/ 00065000
*/*   RESET THE QUIESCE BIT IN THE UCB.                              */ 00066000
*                                                               01S0159 00067000
*           RFY                                                 01S0159 00068000
*            (R1P,                                              01S0159 00069000
*             R2P,                                              01S0159 00070000
*             R13P,                                             01S0159 00071000
*             R14P) RSTD;                                       01S0159 00072000
*           R2P=R13P;               /* SAVE SAVE AREA ADDRESS.       */ 00073000
         LR    R2P,R13P                                         01S0160 00074000
*           R13P=ADDR(SAVEAREA(1)); /* GIVE IOSGEN ITS SAVE AREA.    */ 00075000
         LA    R13P,SAVEAREA                                    01S0161 00076000
*           R1P=APUBUCB;            /* UCB ADDRESS.                  */ 00077000
         L     R1P,APUBUCB(,APUBPTR)                            01S0162 00078000
*           GEN REFS(UCBFLA,UCBFLB,UCBFLC,CVTPTR,CVTIXAVL,IOCGENA,UCBOB 00079000
*               ,UCBCCWOF,UCB3TAPE,CVTMAP,IOCOM,UCBCMEXT,UCBEXTPT)      00080000
*               (IOSGEN UCBFLG,UCB=(R1P),VAR=OFF,TABLE=UCBQISCE  );     00081000
         IOSGEN UCBFLG,UCB=(R1P),VAR=OFF,TABLE=UCBQISCE                 00082000
*           R1P=R1P->UCBCHAN;       /* GET DEVICE ADDRESS.           */ 00083000
         LH    @15,UCBCHAN(,R1P)                                01S0164 00084000
         N     @15,@CF02366                                     01S0164 00085000
         LR    R1P,@15                                          01S0164 00086000
*           GEN REFS(CVTPTR,CVTIXAVL,CVTMAP,IOCGENA,IOCOM)/* GEN        00087000
*                                      INTERRUPT.                    */ 00088000
*               (IOSINTRP UCB=R1P,VAR=2,BRANCH=YES);            01S0165 00089000
         IOSINTRP UCB=R1P,VAR=2,BRANCH=YES                              00090000
*           R13P=R2P;               /* RESTORE SAVE AREA ADDRESS.    */ 00091000
         LR    R13P,R2P                                         01S0166 00092000
*           RFY                                                 01S0167 00093000
*            (R13P,                                             01S0167 00094000
*             R14P) UNRSTD;                                     01S0167 00095000
*           GOTO CE0001@;           /* BRANCH TO END OF CASE         */ 00096000
         B     CE0001@                                          01S0168 00097000
*         END;                      /* END OF SUBCASE END OF RESET.  */ 00098000
*FC2:                                                           01S0170 00099000
*         DO;                       /* SUBCASE SET PURGE ROUTINE =      00100000
*                                      IGTKBF.                       */ 00101000
FC2      DS    0H                                               01S0171 00102000
*           RFY                                                 01S0171 00103000

*                                                               01S0174 00118000

@NM00076 EQU   FLCPIILC                                                 02457000

./  ADD  SSI=70920289,NAME=IGTUKA
TUKA     TITLE 'IGTUKA -- ESTAE/SETFRR EXIT ROUTINE                    *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGTUKA   CSECT ,                                                01S0001 00003000
@MAINENT DS    0H                                               01S0001 00004000
         USING *,@15                                            01S0001 00005000
         B     @PROLOG                                          01S0001 00006000
         DC    AL1(16)                                          01S0001 00007000
         DC    C'IGTUKA    77.092'                              01S0001 00008000
         DROP  @15                                                      00009000
@PROLOG  BALR  @07,0                                            01S0001 00010000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                               01S0001 00011000
         USING @PSTART,@07                                      01S0001 00012000
*                                   /*                                  00013000
*********************************************************************** 00014000
**                                                                   ** 00015000
**  DEFINE MACRO GLOBALS WHICH INDICATE THOSE SU'S APPLIED TO        ** 00016000
**  THE SYSTEM.  BIT-1 = 1 IF SU1 APPLIED, BIT-2 = 1 IF SU-2         ** 00017000
**  APPLIED, ETC. THESE BITS ARE SET BY MACROS IHASUXX WHERE         ** 00018000
**  XX IS THE 1 OR 2 DIGIT SU NUMBER (1-99). THESE BITS ARE MAPPED   ** 00019000
**  BY MACRO IHASUBIT. THESE IHASUXX MACROS RESIDE ON SYS1.AMODGEN.  ** 00020000
**                                                                   ** 00021000
*********************************************************************** 00022000
         SPACE 2                                                        00023000
         GBLB  &SGIHASU(100)       SU INDICATORS                        00024000
         SPACE 2                                                        00025000
*********************************************************************** 00026000
**                                                                   ** 00027000
**  THE FOLLOWING MACRO INVOCATION WILL SET BIT &SGIHASU(33) TO      ** 00028000
**  EITHER 0 OR 1 INDICATING WHETHER SU-33 (DUMPING IMPROVEMENTS)    ** 00029000
**  HAS BEEN APPLIED TO THE SYSTEM.  SYS1.AMODGEN MUST BE PART OF    ** 00030000
**  THE ASSEMBLER'S SYSLIB DD STATEMENT (IHASUXX MEMBERS RESIDE      ** 00031000
**  ON SYS1.AMODGEN).                                                ** 00032000
**  THE IBM ASSEMBLY WILL ALWAYS ASSUME SU-33 HAS BEEN APPLIED.      ** 00033000
**  NOTE THAT THE AVAILABILITY OF SU33 IS ALSO CHECKED AT EXECUTION  ** 00034000
**  TIME.  THEREFORE THE CODE ASSEMBLED WITH SU33 PRESENT WILL ALSO  ** 00035000
**  EXECUTE ON A SYSTEM WITHOUT SU-33.                               ** 00036000
**                                                                   ** 00037000
*********************************************************************** 00038000
         SPACE 2                                                        00039000
         IHASU33 ,                 DETERMINE IF SU-33 APPLIED           00040000
*   IF R0F=12 THEN                  /* IF NO SDWA OBTAINED,          */ 00041000

*     RETURN CODE(0);               /* JUST CONTINUE THE ABEND       */ 00044000
*                                                               01S0061 00045000

*   /*                                                               */ 00051000

         BE    @RF00066                                         01S0066 00069000
*     DO;                           /* 'APES' BLOCK, IS ERROR        */ 00070000
*       DO;                         /* SETRP WKAREA(ADDR(SDWA))DUMP(Y   00071000

*     END;                          /* INVALID 'APES' PROCESSED      */ 00099000
*                                                               01S0079 00100000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00101000
*   /*                                                               */ 00102000
*   /* RAPESPTR POINTS TO 'APES' BLOCK. RELOAD REGISTER APCTPTR FROM */ 00103000

*   /* RETURN AND SDWA ADDRESSES.                                    */ 00105000

*                                                               01S0080 00108000

*   RFY                                                         01S0087 00124000

*                                                               01S0087 00126000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00127000
*   /*                                                               */ 00128000
*   /* DETERMINE IF ENTERED FROM SETFRR OR ESTAE. ALSO DETERMINE IF  */ 00129000
*   /* LOCAL AND/OR CMS LOCKS OWNED. SET APESFLG1 ACCORDINGLY.       */ 00130000
*   /*                                                               */ 00131000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00132000
*                                                               01S0088 00133000
*   APESFFRR=BOFF;                  /* RESET FRR IN-CONTROL,         */ 00134000

         NI    APESFFRR(RAPESPTR),B'01001111'                   01S0090 00137000
*   GEN REFS(PSAHLHI) FLOWS(KNOWLOCK) SEQFLOW;                  01S0091 00138000

*   /*                                                               */ 00159000

*   /* ENTERED FROM SETFRR, REGISTER 0 ON INPUT CONTAINS THE ADDRESS */ 00161000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00228000
*   /*                                                               */ 00229000

*     DO;                           /* THEN REQUEST MAXIMUM.         */ 00238000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00270000
*   /*                                                               */ 00271000
*   /* IF THIS TASK WAS NOT IN CONTROL AT THE TIME OF THE ERROR BUT A*/ 00272000
*   /* TASK WITHIN THE SAME JOBSTEP REQUESTED A 'STEP' ABEND         */ 00273000
*   /* (SDWACTS=1), OR AN ANCESTOR TASK ABENDED (SDWAMABD=1), THEN DO*/ 00274000
*   /* NOT TAKE A SYSUDUMP. NOTE THAT SDWACLUP=1 IN ALL CASES.       */ 00275000

*     APESFDMP=BOFF;                /* DO NOT TAKE SYSUDUMP.         */ 00283000

         NI    APESFDMP(RAPESPTR),B'01111111'                   01S0131 00285000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00286000
*   /*                                                               */ 00287000
*   /* IF A LOWER LEVEL RECOVERY ROUTINE HAS PROVIDED SERVICEABILITY */ 00288000
*   /* INFORMATION (SDWAEAS=1), THEN DO NOT PROVIDE A SECOND SDUMP OF*/ 00289000
*   /* THE PROBLEM.                                                  */ 00290000
*   /*                                                               */ 00291000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00292000
*                                                               01S0132 00293000

         BNO   @RF00132                                         01S0132 00296000
*     APESFSDP=BOFF;                /* DEBUG DATA, NO SDUMP NEEDED.  */ 00297000
         NI    APESFSDP(RAPESPTR),B'11011111'                   01S0133 00298000
*                                                               01S0134 00299000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00300000
*   /*                                                               */ 00301000
*   /* IF NON-RECURSIVE EXTRY, CALL THE USER'S EXTENDED ESTAE/FRR    */ 00302000
*   /* EXIT (APESEXRA) IF SPECIFIED (APESFEXR = 1).                  */ 00303000
*   /*                                                               */ 00304000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00305000
*                                                               01S0134 00306000
*   IF APESFEXR=BON&                /* IF EXIT ROUTINE SPECIFIED,    */ 00307000
*       APESFPRV=BOFF THEN          /* AND NOT RECURSION PROCESSING, */ 00308000
@RF00132 TM    APESFEXR(RAPESPTR),B'00000100'                   01S0134 00309000

         TM    APESFPRV(RAPESPTR),B'01000000'                   01S0134 00311000
         BNZ   @RF00134                                         01S0134 00312000
*     DO;                           /* THEN CALL EXIT RTN (APESEXRA).*/ 00313000
*       RFY                                                     01S0136 00314000
*        (R0P,                                                  01S0136 00315000
*         R14P,                                                 01S0136 00316000
*         R15P) RSTD;               /* INTERFACE REGISTERS           */ 00317000
*       APESFPRV=BON;               /* TREAT ERROR AS RECURSION      */ 00318000
         OI    APESFPRV(RAPESPTR),B'01000000'                   01S0137 00319000
*       MVC(DUXINSTR,CUXINSTR);     /* INITIALIZE RETURN CODE        */ 00320000
         MVC   DUXINSTR(8,R1P),CUXINSTR                         01S0138 00321000
*       STM(R0F,R14F,DUXREGS);      /* SAVE CURRENT REGISTERS        */ 00322000
         STM   R0F,R14F,DUXREGS(R1P)                            01S0139 00323000
*       R0P=ADDR(APES);             /* CALLER GETS APES ADDR IN R0   */ 00324000
         LR    R0P,RAPESPTR                                     01S0140 00325000
*       R1P=ADDR(SDWA);             /* CALLER GETS SDWA ADDR IN R1   */ 00326000

         LA    R14P,DUXDATA(,R1P)                               01S0142 00328000

         L     R15P,APESEXRA(,RAPESPTR)                         01S0143 00330000
*       R13P=APESREGP;              /* POINT TO SAVED REGISTERS      */ 00331000
         L     R13P,APESREGP(,RAPESPTR)                         01S0144 00332000
*       GEN(LM    R2P,R13P,APESREG2-APESREGS(R13P))             01S0145 00333000
*       REFS(R2P,R13P,APESREG2,APESREGS,R13P);/* USER REGISTERS      */ 00334000
         LM    R2P,R13P,APESREG2-APESREGS(R13P)                         00335000
*       GEN(BR    R15P)                                         01S0146 00336000
*       REFS(R15P) SETS(R15F);      /* CALL EXIT ROUTINE             */ 00337000
         BR    R15P                                                     00338000
*       RFY                                                     01S0147 00339000
*        (R0P,                                                  01S0147 00340000
*         R14P,                                                 01S0147 00341000
*         R15P) UNRSTD;             /* FINISHED WITH INPUT REGS      */ 00342000
*       RFY                                                     01S0148 00343000
*         R15F RSTD;                /* RETRY INDICATOR (0/4)         */ 00344000
*LUEXIT:                            /* USER RETURN (VIA DUXINSTR).   */ 00345000
*                                                               01S0149 00346000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00347000
*       /*                                                           */ 00348000
*       /* CONTROL RETURNS TO 'DUXDATA' WHICH LOADS THE SAVED        */ 00349000
*       /* REGISTER VALUES FOR R0-R14, AND BRANCHES TO 'LUEXIT'.     */ 00350000
*       /* REGISTER 15 HAS THE RETRY/NORETRY INDICATOR (0/4).        */ 00351000
*       /*                                                           */ 00352000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00353000
*                                                               01S0149 00354000
*       APESFPRV=BOFF;              /* RESET RECURSION INDICATOR     */ 00355000
LUEXIT   NI    APESFPRV(RAPESPTR),B'10111111'                   01S0149 00356000
*       APESFRTY=BOFF;              /* BASED UPON REGISTER 15, SET   */ 00357000
         NI    APESFRTY(RAPESPTR),B'11110111'                   01S0150 00358000
*       IF R15FÂ¬=4 THEN             /* RETRY/NORETRY FLAG (4/0).     */ 00359000
         C     R15F,@CF00045                                    01S0151 00360000
         BE    @RF00151                                         01S0151 00361000
*         APESFRTY=BON;             /* NO RETRY IF CODE NOT 4.       */ 00362000
         OI    APESFRTY(RAPESPTR),B'00001000'                   01S0152 00363000
*       RFY                                                     01S0153 00364000
*         R15F UNRSTD;              /* DONE WITH RETURN CODE         */ 00365000
@RF00151 DS    0H                                               01S0154 00366000
*     END;                          /* APESEXRA PROCESSED            */ 00367000
*                                                               01S0155 00368000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00369000
*   /*                                                               */ 00370000
*   /* SET SVCDUMP PARAMETERS FOR SYSTEMS WITH SU-33 AND SYSTEMS     */ 00371000
*   /* WITHOUT SU-33 (DUMPING IMPROVEMENTS).                         */ 00372000
*   /*                                                               */ 00373000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00374000
*                                                               01S0155 00375000
*   IF SU33BIT=BOFF THEN            /* IF SU-33 HAS NOT BEEN APPLIED,*/ 00376000
@RF00134 L     @04,CVTPTR                                       01S0155 00377000
         L     @04,CVTIHASU(,@04)                               01S0155 00378000
         TM    SU33BIT(@04),B'01000000'                         01S0155 00379000
         BNZ   @RF00155                                         01S0155 00380000
*     DO;                           /* THEN DUMP ONLY USER.          */ 00381000
*       APESSU33=BOFF;              /* SHOW SU-33 NOT APPLIED        */ 00382000
         NI    APESSU33(RAPESPTR),B'01111111'                   01S0157 00383000
*       DASID1=ASCBASID;            /* DUMP CURRENT ASCB             */ 00384000
         L     @04,ASCBPTR                                      01S0158 00385000
         LH    @04,ASCBASID(,@04)                               01S0158 00386000
         N     @04,@CF02632                                     01S0158 00387000
         STH   @04,DASID1                                       01S0158 00388000
*     END;                          /* NON-SU33 PROCESSING COMPLETE  */ 00389000
*   ELSE                            /* IF SU-33 HAS BEEN APPLIED,    */ 00390000
*     DO;                           /* DUMP USER & MONITOR.          */ 00391000
         B     @RC00155                                         01S0160 00392000
@RF00155 DS    0H                                               01S0161 00393000
*       APESSU33=BON;               /* SHOW SU-33 APPLIED            */ 00394000
         OI    APESSU33(RAPESPTR),B'10000000'                   01S0161 00395000
*       IF ASCBASID=APCTASID THEN   /* IF MONITOR IS CURRENT,        */ 00396000
         LH    @04,APCTASID(,APCTPTR)                           01S0162 00397000
         L     @02,ASCBPTR                                      01S0162 00398000

         N     @02,@CF02632                                     01S0162 00400000
         CR    @04,@02                                          01S0162 00401000
         BNE   @RF00162                                         01S0162 00402000
*         DASID1=APCTASID|          /* THEN ONLY DUMP ONE            */ 00403000
*             '8000'X;              /* ADDRESS SPACE (MONITOR).      */ 00404000
         O     @04,@CF02515                                     01S0163 00405000
         STH   @04,DASID1                                       01S0163 00406000
*       ELSE                        /* IF NOT THE MONITOR, THEN      */ 00407000
*         DO;                       /* DUMP 2 ADDRESS SPACES --      */ 00408000
         B     @RC00162                                         01S0164 00409000
@RF00162 DS    0H                                               01S0165 00410000
*           DASID1=ASCBASID;        /* 1 -- USER                     */ 00411000
         L     @04,ASCBPTR                                      01S0165 00412000
         LH    @04,ASCBASID(,@04)                               01S0165 00413000
         N     @04,@CF02632                                     01S0165 00414000
         STH   @04,DASID1                                       01S0165 00415000
*           DASID2=APCTASID|        /* 2 -- MONITOR                  */ 00416000
*               '8000'X;            /* SHOW END-OF-LIST.             */ 00417000
         L     @04,@CF02515                                     01S0166 00418000
         LH    @02,APCTASID(,APCTPTR)                           01S0166 00419000

*         END;                      /* SU-33 LIST SET                */ 00422000
*     END;                          /* SU-33 OPTIONS SET             */ 00423000
*                                                               01S0168 00424000
@RC00162 DS    0H                                               01S0169 00425000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00426000
*   /*                                                               */ 00427000
*   /* ESTABLISH DUMP OPTION IN SDWA                                 */ 00428000
*   /*                                                               */ 00429000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00430000
*                                                               01S0169 00431000
*   IF APESFDMP=BOFF THEN           /* IF USER DUMP NOT WANTED       */ 00432000

         BNZ   @RF00169                                         01S0169 00434000
*     DO;                           /* SETRP                    01S0170 00435000
*                                      WKAREA(ADDR(SDWA))DUMP(NO)    */ 00436000
*       RESPECIFY                                               01S0171 00437000

*         GPR01P,                                               01S0171 00439000

*       GPR01P->SDWAREQ='1'B;       /* TURN ON DUMP INDICATOR        */ 00466000

*       GEN(TM    1(15),X'02');     /* TEST FOR STORAGE LIST         */ 00476000

*       BC(1,M0012);                /* BRANCH IF SPECIFIED           */ 00478000

*         GOTO E0012;               /* BRANCH IF NO STORAGE LIST     */ 00483000
*M0012:                                                         01S0190 00484000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00562000
*   /*                                                               */ 00563000
*   /* MOVE MODULE/CSECT/FRR NAMES IN THE SDWA. THIS IS PERFORMED    */ 00564000
*   /* EVEN IF RECORDING IS NOT WANTED SINCE THIS DATA IS ALSO MOVED */ 00565000

*                                                               01S0210 00569000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00575000
*   /*                                                               */ 00576000

*                                                               01S0212 00583000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00585000
*   /*                                                               */ 00586000
*   /* VALIDATE 'APESCODE'. IF INVALID, SET TO 'INDETERMINATE-ERROR' */ 00587000
*   /* VALUE (APESMXCD).                                             */ 00588000
*   /*                                                               */ 00589000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00590000
*                                                               01S0212 00591000
*   IF APESCODE<=0|                 /* IF ERROR CODE OUT             */ 00592000

*   /*****************************************************************/ 00603000
*   /*                                                               */ 00604000
*   /* USE APESCODE TO INDEX INTO MESSAGE MODULE IGTMBR TO CONSTRUCT */ 00605000
*   /* THE ERROR MESSAGE.                                            */ 00606000

*                                                               01S0214 00609000
