         MVC   MXNO(2,R1P),@CC02534                             01S0238 00689000
*   MXSDUMPL=LENGTH(MXSDUMP)-       /* LENGTH OF SDUMP HEADER        */ 00690000
*       LENGTH(MXSDUMPL);           /* (LENGTH FIELD NOT INCLUDED).  */ 00691000
@RF00237 MVI   MXSDUMPL(R1P),X'40'                              01S0239 00692000
*   SDWAURAL=LENGTH(MXMSG);         /* LENGTH OF DATA                */ 00693000
         MVI   SDWAURAL(R1P),X'51'                              01S0240 00694000
*   SDWAHEX=BOFF;                   /* HEX DUMP NOT NEEDED           */ 00695000
*   SDWAEBC=BON;                    /* DUMP IN EBCDIC WANTED         */ 00696000
         OI    SDWAEBC(R1P),B'01000000'                         01S0242 00697000
         NI    SDWAHEX(R1P),B'01111111'                         01S0242 00698000
*                                                               01S0243 00699000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00700000
*   /*                                                               */ 00701000
*   /* ISSUE SDUMP. IF ENTERED BECAUSE OF SETFRR, USE THE BRANCH     */ 00702000
*   /* ENTRY TO SDUMP. OTHERWISE ISSUE AN SVC.                       */ 00703000
*   /*                                                               */ 00704000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00705000
*                                                               01S0243 00706000
*   IF APESFSDP=BON THEN            /* IF SDUMP REQUESTED,           */ 00707000
         TM    APESFSDP(RAPESPTR),B'00100000'                   01S0243 00708000
         BNO   @RF00243                                         01S0243 00709000
*     DO;                           /* BUILD & ISSUE REQUEST.        */ 00710000
*       SDWAEAS=BON;                /* SERVICEABILITY DATA PROVIDED  */ 00711000
         OI    SDWAEAS(R1P),B'00001000'                         01S0245 00712000
*       RFY                                                     01S0246 00713000
*         RMSGPTR RSTD;             /* POINT TO SDUMP HEADER         */ 00714000
*       RMSGPTR=ADDR(MXSDUMP);      /* MESSAGE IN THE SDWA.          */ 00715000
*                                                               01S0247 00716000
         LA    RMSGPTR,MXSDUMP(,R1P)                            01S0247 00717000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00718000
*       /*                                                           */ 00719000
*       /* ISSUE SDUMP (BRANCH OR SVC)                               */ 00720000
*       /*                                                           */ 00721000
*       /*************************************************************/ 00722000
*                                                               01S0248 00723000
*       GEN(MVC   DXSDUMP,CXSDUMP)                              01S0248 00724000
*       REFS(CXSDUMP) SETS(DXSDUMP);/* INITIALIZE SDUMP LIST         */ 00725000
         MVC   DXSDUMP,CXSDUMP                                          00726000
*       IF APESFLLK=BON THEN        /* IF LOCAL LOCK OWNED (FRR)     */ 00727000
         TM    APESFLLK(RAPESPTR),B'00100000'                   01S0249 00728000
         BNO   @RF00249                                         01S0249 00729000
*         IF APESSU33=BOFF THEN     /* IF SU-33 NOT APPLIED          */ 00730000
         TM    APESSU33(RAPESPTR),B'10000000'                   01S0250 00731000
         BNZ   @RF00250                                         01S0250 00732000
*           GEN REFS(DXSDUMP,CVTPTR,CVTSDMP,CVTMAP,RMSGPTR,DASID1) SETS 00733000
*               (DXSDUMP,R0F,R1F,R14F,R15F);                    01S0251 00734000
*                                              /*                       00735000
         SDUMP BRANCH=YES,         LOCAL LOCK OWNED  (NO SVCS)         *00736000
               ASID=DASID1,        DUMP OUR ADDRESS SPACE              *00737000
               HDRAD=(RMSGPTR),    TITLE                               *00738000
               MF=(E,DXSDUMP)      EXECUTE FORMAT                       00739000
*         ELSE                      /* IF SU-33 APPLIED --           */ 00740000
*           GEN REFS(DXSDUMP,CVTPTR,CVTSDMP,CVTMAP,RMSGPTR,DASIDX) SETS 00741000
*               (DXSDUMP,R0F,R1F,R14F,R15F);                    01S0252 00742000
         B     @RC00250                                         01S0252 00743000
@RF00250 DS    0H                                               01S0252 00744000
*                                                /*                     00745000
         AIF   (NOT &SGIHASU(33)).SU33N04 SKIP IF SU-33 NOT ON          00746000
         SDUMP BRANCH=YES,         LOCAL LOCK OWNED  (NO SVCS)         *00747000
               ASIDLST=DASIDX,     DUMP FAILING ADDRESS SPACE + MONITOR*00748000
               HDRAD=(RMSGPTR),    TITLE                               *00749000
               MF=(E,DXSDUMP)      EXECUTE FORMAT                       00750000
         AGO   .SU33Y04                SKIP EXPANSION FOR NO SU-33      00751000
.SU33N04 ANOP  ,                       SU-33 NOT APPLIED                00752000
.SU33Y04 ANOP  ,                       SDUMP WITH SU-33 PROCESSED       00753000
*       ELSE                        /* IF BRANCH ENTRY NOT WANTED -- */ 00754000
*         IF APESSU33=BOFF THEN     /* IF SU-33 NOT APPLIED --       */ 00755000
         B     @RC00249                                         01S0253 00756000
@RF00249 TM    APESSU33(RAPESPTR),B'10000000'                   01S0253 00757000
         BNZ   @RF00253                                         01S0253 00758000
*           GEN REFS(DXSDUMP,RMSGPTR) SETS(DXSDUMP,R0F,R1F,R14F,R15F);  00759000
*                                                /*                     00760000
           SDUMP BRANCH=NO,        LOCAL LOCK NOT OWNED                *00761000
               HDRAD=(RMSGPTR),    TITLE                               *00762000
               MF=(E,DXSDUMP)      EXECUTE FORMAT                       00763000
*         ELSE                      /* IF SU-33 APPLIED --           */ 00764000
*           GEN REFS(DXSDUMP,RMSGPTR,DASIDX) SETS(DXSDUMP,R0F,R1F,R14F, 00765000
*               R15F);                                          01S0255 00766000
         B     @RC00253                                         01S0255 00767000
@RF00253 DS    0H                                               01S0255 00768000
*                                                /*                     00769000
         AIF   (NOT &SGIHASU(33)).SU33N05 SKIP IF SU-33 NOT ON          00770000
         SDUMP BRANCH=NO,          LOCAL LOCK NOT OWNED                *00771000
               ASIDLST=DASIDX,     DUMP FAILING ADDRESS SPACE + MONITOR*00772000
               HDRAD=(RMSGPTR),    TITLE                               *00773000
               MF=(E,DXSDUMP)      EXECUTE FORMAT                       00774000
         AGO   .SU33Y05                SKIP EXPANSION FOR NO SU-33      00775000
.SU33N05 ANOP  ,                       SU-33 NOT APPLIED                00776000
.SU33Y05 ANOP  ,                       SDUMP WITH SU-33 PROCESSED       00777000
*     END;                          /* SDUMP PROCESSED               */ 00778000
@RC00253 DS    0H                                               01S0256 00779000
@RC00249 DS    0H                                               01S0257 00780000
*   RFY                                                         01S0257 00781000
*     RMSGPTR UNRSTD;               /* DONE WITH SDUMP HEADER        */ 00782000
@RF00243 DS    0H                                               01S0258 00783000
*   R1P=RSDWAPTR;                   /* RE-INITIALIZE SDWA POINTER    */ 00784000
*                                                               01S0258 00785000
         LR    R1P,RSDWAPTR                                     01S0258 00786000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00787000
*   /*                                                               */ 00788000
*   /* IF THIS IS A RECURSION ENTRY (APESFPRV=1) OR NO RETRY IS      */ 00789000
*   /* WANTED (APESFRTY=1) THEN INDICATE SO IN THE SDWA.             */ 00790000
*   /*                                                               */ 00791000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00792000
*                                                               01S0259 00793000
*   IF APESFPRV=BON|                /* IF THIS IS RECURSION ENTRY    */ 00794000
*       APESFRTY=BON THEN           /* OR NO RETRY WANTED,           */ 00795000
         TM    APESFPRV(RAPESPTR),B'01000000'                   01S0259 00796000
         BO    @RT00259                                         01S0259 00797000
         TM    APESFRTY(RAPESPTR),B'00001000'                   01S0259 00798000
         BNO   @RF00259                                         01S0259 00799000
@RT00259 DS    0H                                               01S0260 00800000
*     DO;                           /* SETRP WKAREA(ADDR(SDWA))RC(0) */ 00801000
*       RESPECIFY                                               01S0261 00802000
*        (GPR00P,                                               01S0261 00803000
*         GPR01P,                                               01S0261 00804000
*         GPR14P,                                               01S0261 00805000
*         GPR15P) RSTD;                                         01S0261 00806000
*       GPR01P=ADDR(SDWA);                                      01S0262 00807000
*       GPR01P->SDWARCDE=0;         /* SAVE RC VALUE                 */ 00808000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'00'                           01S0263 00809000
*       RESPECIFY                                               01S0264 00810000
*        (GPR00P,                                               01S0264 00811000
*         GPR01P,                                               01S0264 00812000
*         GPR14P,                                               01S0264 00813000
*         GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                       01S0264 00814000
*     END;                          /* NO RETRY                      */ 00815000
*   ELSE                            /* IF NOT RECURSION --           */ 00816000
*                                                               01S0266 00817000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00818000
*     /*                                                             */ 00819000
*     /* IF NON-RECURSIVE ENTRY AND RETRY WANTED, ESTABLISH REGISTERS*/ 00820000
*     /* AND INDICATE IN SDWA THAT RETRY IS WANTED.                  */ 00821000
*     /*                                                             */ 00822000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00823000
*                                                               01S0266 00824000
*     DO;                           /* ESTABLISH RETRY VALUES --     */ 00825000
         B     @RC00259                                         01S0266 00826000
@RF00259 DS    0H                                               01S0267 00827000
*       SDWASRSV=APESREGS;          /* RETRY REGISTERS               */ 00828000
         L     @04,APESREGP(,RAPESPTR)                          01S0267 00829000
         MVC   SDWASRSV(64,R1P),APESREGS(@04)                   01S0267 00830000
*       SDWASR00=ADDR(APES);        /* 'APES' ADDRESS                */ 00831000
         ST    RAPESPTR,SDWASR00(,R1P)                          01S0268 00832000
*       SDWASR01=ADDR(APESSDWA);    /* SAVED 'SDWA' ADDRESS          */ 00833000
         LA    @04,APESSDWA(,RAPESPTR)                          01S0269 00834000
         ST    @04,SDWASR01(,R1P)                               01S0269 00835000
*       DO;                         /* SETRP WKAREA(ADDR(SDWA))RC(4)R   00836000
*                                      ETADDR(SDWASR15->I031P)RETREGS   00837000
*                                      (YES)FRESDWA(YES)             */ 00838000
*         RESPECIFY                                             01S0271 00839000
*          (GPR00P,                                             01S0271 00840000
*           GPR01P,                                             01S0271 00841000
*           GPR14P,                                             01S0271 00842000
*           GPR15P) RSTD;                                       01S0271 00843000
*         GPR01P=ADDR(SDWA);                                    01S0272 00844000
*         GPR01P->SDWARCDE=4;       /* STORE RC INTO SDWA            */ 00845000
         MVI   SDWARCDE(GPR01P),X'04'                           01S0273 00846000
*         GPR01P->SDWARTYA=ADDR(SDWASR15->I031P);/* SAVE RETRY  01S0274 00847000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00848000
         L     @04,SDWASR15(,R1P)                               01S0274 00849000
         ST    @04,SDWARTYA(,GPR01P)                            01S0274 00850000
*         GPR01P->SDWAFREE='1'B;    /* SET FLAG TO FREE SDWA         */ 00851000
*         GPR01P->SDWAUPRG='1'B;    /* TURN ON RETREGS INDICATOR     */ 00852000
         OI    SDWAFREE(GPR01P),B'00001100'                     01S0276 00853000
*         RESPECIFY                                             01S0277 00854000
*          (GPR00P,                                             01S0277 00855000
*           GPR01P,                                             01S0277 00856000
*           GPR14P,                                             01S0277 00857000
*           GPR15P) UNRSTD;                                     01S0277 00858000
*       END;                        /* FREE SDWA BEFORE RETRY        */ 00859000
*     END;                          /* SDWA UPDATED                  */ 00860000
*                                                               01S0279 00861000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00862000
*   /*                                                               */ 00863000
*   /* SINCE APESSDWA MAY BE SUBSTITUTING AS A SAVEAREA/WORKAREA     */ 00864000
*   /* (ESTAE EXIT GETMAIN FAILED), AND THE REAL SDWA IS TO BE COPIED*/ 00865000
*   /* TO APESSDWA, NO FURTHER REFERENCES TO THE PL/S DYNAMIC AREA OR*/ 00866000
*   /* THE SAVEAREA MAY BE MADE.                                     */ 00867000
*   /*                                                               */ 00868000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00869000
*                                                               01S0280 00870000
*   GEN(DROP  APDATA)                                           01S0280 00871000
*   NOSETS REFS(APDATA);            /* TELL ASSEMBLER NO DYNAMIC AREA*/ 00872000
*                                                               01S0280 00873000
@RC00259 DS    0H                                               01S0280 00874000
         DROP  APDATA                                                   00875000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00876000
*   /*                                                               */ 00877000
*   /* IF INITIAL ABEND, SAVE ERROR CODE (APESCODE) AND THE SDWA.    */ 00878000
*   /* THIS INSURES THE DUMP DESCRIBES THE INITIAL ABEND PROBLEM.    */ 00879000
*   /*                                                               */ 00880000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00881000
*                                                               01S0281 00882000
*   IF APESCOD1=0 THEN              /* IF STILL 0, IS 1ST ABEND      */ 00883000
         CLI   APESCOD1(RAPESPTR),0                             01S0281 00884000
         BNE   @RF00281                                         01S0281 00885000
*     DO;                           /* THEREFORE SAVE DATA.          */ 00886000
*       APESCOD1=APESCODE;          /* SAVE ERROR CODE               */ 00887000
         IC    @04,APESCODE(,RAPESPTR)                          01S0283 00888000
         STC   @04,APESCOD1(,RAPESPTR)                          01S0283 00889000
*       RFY                                                     01S0284 00890000
*        (R0P,                                                  01S0284 00891000
*         R1F,                                                  01S0284 00892000
*         R14P,                                                 01S0284 00893000
*         R15F) RSTD;               /* USE MVCL TO SAVE              */ 00894000
*       R0P=R1F;                    /* SDWA SINCE MORE               */ 00895000
         LR    R0P,R1F                                          01S0285 00896000
*       R1F=LENGTH(SDWA);           /* THAN 256 BYTES LONG.          */ 00897000
         LA    R1F,512                                          01S0286 00898000
*       R15F=R1F;                   /* NOTE: AFTER MVCL, REGISTER 1  */ 00899000
         LR    R15F,R1F                                         01S0287 00900000
*       R14P=ADDR(APESSDWA);        /* NO LONGER POINTS TO SDWA,     */ 00901000
         LA    R14P,APESSDWA(,RAPESPTR)                         01S0288 00902000
*       MVCL(R14P,R0P);             /* THEREFORE MUST                */ 00903000
         MVCL  R14P,R0P                                         01S0289 00904000
*       RFY                                                     01S0290 00905000
*        (R0P,                                                  01S0290 00906000
*         R1F,                                                  01S0290 00907000
*         R14P,                                                 01S0290 00908000
*         R15F) UNRSTD;             /* RE-INITIALIZE THE             */ 00909000
*       R1P=RSDWAPTR;               /* SDWA POINTER                  */ 00910000
         LR    R1P,RSDWAPTR                                     01S0291 00911000
*       APESFSDI=BOFF;              /* SHOW SAVED SDWA IS VALID      */ 00912000
         NI    APESFSDI(RAPESPTR),B'11111011'                   01S0292 00913000
*     END;                          /* 1ST ABEND PROCESSING DONE.    */ 00914000
*                                                               01S0293 00915000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00916000
*   /*                                                               */ 00917000
*   /* PROCESSING COMPLETE. IF THE SAVEAREA/WORKAREA WAS OBTAINED VIA*/ 00918000
*   /* A GETMAIN (APESFGM=1) THEN FREE THE STORAGE BEFORE EXITING.   */ 00919000
*   /* RETURN TO ABEND TO EITHER CONTINUE THE ABEND OR SCHEDULE A    */ 00920000
*   /* RETRY ROUTINE.                                                */ 00921000
*   /*                                                               */ 00922000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00923000
*                                                               01S0294 00924000
*   IF APESFGM=BON THEN             /* IF GETMAIN ISSUED,            */ 00925000
@RF00281 TM    APESFGM(RAPESPTR),B'00001000'                    01S0294 00926000
         BNO   @RF00294                                         01S0294 00927000
*     DO;                           /* THEN FREE STORAGE.            */ 00928000
*       GEN(FREEMAIN R,LV=200,SP=253,A=(APDATA))                01S0296 00929000
*       REFS(APDATA);               /* APDATA POINTS TO ACQUIRED AREA*/ 00930000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=200,SP=253,A=(APDATA)                            00931000
*       R1P=RSDWAPTR;               /* RE-ESTABLISH SDWA POINTER (R1)*/ 00932000
         LR    R1P,RSDWAPTR                                     01S0297 00933000
*     END;                          /* STORAGE FREED.                */ 00934000
*   APESFPRV=BON;                   /* SHOW RETRY SCHEDULED. RETRY      00935000
*                                      ROUTINE MUST RESET WHEN  01S0299 00936000
*                                      RECOVERY COMPLETE.            */ 00937000
@RF00294 OI    APESFPRV(RAPESPTR),B'01000000'                   01S0299 00938000
*   RFY                                                         01S0300 00939000
*     R14P RSTD;                    /* HOLDS RETURN ADDRESS          */ 00940000
*   R14P=APESR14S;                  /* R14P = INPUT VALUE OF R14     */ 00941000
         L     R14P,APESR14S(,RAPESPTR)                         01S0301 00942000
*   RETURN;                         /* RETURN TO ABEND MODULE        */ 00943000
         B     @EL00001                                         01S0302 00944000
*   RFY                                                         01S0303 00945000
*     R14P UNRSTD;                  /* FINISHED WITH R14             */ 00946000
*   RFY                                                         01S0304 00947000
*    (SDWA,                                                     01S0304 00948000
*     APES);                        /* FINISHED WITH SDWA AND APES   */ 00949000
*   RFY                                                         01S0305 00950000
*    (R1P,                                                      01S0305 00951000
*     RSDWAPTR,                                                 01S0305 00952000
*     RAPESPTR) UNRSTD;             /* RELEASE REGISTER POINTERS     */ 00953000
         EJECT                                                          00954000
*                                   /* IGTXEPLG                      */ 00955000
*                                                               01S0306 00956000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00957000
*   /*                                                               */ 00958000
*   /* SYSTEM DECLARES                                               */ 00959000
*   /*                                                               */ 00960000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00961000
*                                                               01S0306 00962000
*   DECLARE                         /* GENERAL PURPOSE REGISTERS     */ 00963000
*     GPR00P PTR(31) REG(0),                                    01S0306 00964000
*     GPR01P PTR(31) REG(1),                                    01S0306 00965000
*     GPR14P PTR(31) REG(14),                                   01S0306 00966000
*     GPR15P PTR(31) REG(15);                                   01S0306 00967000
*   DECLARE                         /* COMMON VARIABLES              */ 00968000
*     I256C CHAR(256) BASED,                                    01S0307 00969000
*     I031F FIXED(31) BASED,                                    01S0307 00970000
*     I031P PTR(31) BASED,                                      01S0307 00971000
*     I015F FIXED(15) BASED,                                    01S0307 00972000
*     I015P PTR(15) BASED,                                      01S0307 00973000
*     I008P PTR(8) BASED,                                       01S0307 00974000

*                                                               01S0308 00976000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00977000
*   /*                                                               */ 00978000
*   /* MODULE PATCH AREA                                             */ 00979000
*   /*                                                               */ 00980000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00981000
*                                                               01S0308 00982000
*   DCL                                                         01S0308 00983000
*     APPATCH CHAR(*) INT STATIC LOCAL GEND;                    01S0308 00984000
*   GENERATE DATA DEFS(APPATCH);                                01S0309 00985000
*                                                               01S0310 00986000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00987000
*   /*                                                               */ 00988000
*   /* GENERAL REGISTER DECLARES                                     */ 00989000
*   /*                                                               */ 00990000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00991000
*                                                               01S0310 00992000
*   DCL                                                         01S0310 00993000
*     R0F FIXED(31) REG(0),                                     01S0310 00994000
*     R0P PTR(24) REG(0),                                       01S0310 00995000
*     R0RSTD PTR(31) REG(0),                                    01S0310 00996000

*     R7F FIXED(31) REG(7),                                     01S0310 01015000
*     R7P PTR(24) REG(7),                                       01S0310 01016000
*     R7RSTD PTR(31) REG(7),                                    01S0310 01017000
*     R8F FIXED(31) REG(8),                                     01S0310 01018000
*     R8P PTR(24) REG(8),                                       01S0310 01019000
*     R8RSTD PTR(31) REG(8),                                    01S0310 01020000

*     R9P PTR(24) REG(9),                                       01S0310 01022000
*     R9RSTD PTR(31) REG(9),                                    01S0310 01023000
*     R10F FIXED(31) REG(10),                                   01S0310 01024000
*     R10P PTR(24) REG(10),                                     01S0310 01025000
*     R10RSTD PTR(31) REG(10),                                  01S0310 01026000

*     R11P PTR(24) REG(11),                                     01S0310 01028000
*     R11RSTD PTR(31) REG(11),                                  01S0310 01029000

*     R12RSTD PTR(31) REG(12),                                  01S0310 01032000

*     R13P PTR(24) REG(13),                                     01S0310 01034000
*     R13RSTD PTR(31) REG(13),                                  01S0310 01035000
*     R14F FIXED(31) REG(14),                                   01S0310 01036000
*     R14P PTR(24) REG(14),                                     01S0310 01037000
*     R14RSTD PTR(31) REG(14),                                  01S0310 01038000
*     R15F FIXED(31) REG(15),                                   01S0310 01039000
*     R15P PTR(24) REG(15),                                     01S0310 01040000
*     R15RSTD PTR(31) REG(15),                                  01S0310 01041000
*                                                               01S0310 01042000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01043000
*     /*                                                             */ 01044000
*     /* VPSS CONTROL BLOCK POINTER DECLARES                         */ 01045000
*     /*                                                             */ 01046000
*     /***************************************************************/ 01047000
*                                                               01S0310 01048000
*     APSMPTR PTR(24) REG(01),      /* STORAGE MANAGEMENT BLOCK 01S0310 01049000
*                                      (SUGGESTED POINTER)           */ 01050000
*     APSCPTR PTR(24) REG(01),      /* STORAGE MANAGEMENT CONTROL       01051000
*                                      WORD (SUGGESTED POINTER)      */ 01052000
*     APINPTR PTR(24) REG(01),      /* USER'S INPUT PARAMETER LIST      01053000
*                                      (SUGGESTED POINTER)           */ 01054000

./  ADD  SSI=71800098,NAME=IGT0VPSS
       TITLE 'VPSS SUBSYSTEM INITIALIZATION TABLE'                      00020000
**********************************************************************  00040000
*                                                                    *  00060000
*        IGT0VPSS - VPSS SUBSYSTEM INITIALIZATION TABLE              *  00080000
*                                                                    *  00100000
*        MVS/VS1    09/13/76    LEVEL 01.1                           *  00120000
*                                                                    *  00140000
*     METHOD OF ACCESS - IGT0VPSS IS ASSEMBLED AND LINK-EDITED INTO  *  00160000
*                        SYS1.LOADVPSS AS IGT0VPSS. SUBSYSTEM        *  00180000
*                        INITIALIZATIION ISSUES A LOAD OF            *  00200000
*                        IGT0VPSS.                                   *  00220000
*                                                                    *  00240000
*     FUNCTION - IGT0VPSS CONTAINS SEVERAL TABLES ORGANIZED AS       *  00260000
*                FOLLOWS:                                            *  00280000
*                                                                    *  00300000
*                  (1) APOT - VPSS SUBSYSTEM OPTIONS TABLE           *  00320000
*                             THIS PORTION OF THE APOT CONTAINS      *  00340000
*                             POINTERS TO THE OTHER APOT TABLES -    *  00360000
*                             APOTNM,APOTVT,APOTAD                   *  00380000
*                  (2) APCT - VPSS SUBSYSTEM CONTROL TABLE           *  00400000
*                             THE APCT CONTAINS THE ADDRESSES OF     *  00420000
*                             VPSS PROCESSING ROUTINES, POINTERS TO  *  00440000
*                             VARIOUS VPSS TABLES AND INSTALLATION-  *  00460000
*                             DEFINED PROCESSING PARAMETERS.         *  00480000
*                  (3) ARPT - APCP ROUTINE POINTER TABLE                00500000
*                             THIS TABLE CONTAINS ADDRESSES OF       *  00520000
*                             ROUTINES WHICH PERFORM USER CALL       *  00540000
*                             PROCESSING AS DEFINED IN THE APCP.     *  00560000
*                  (4) APCP/APAL - VPSS CALL INTERFACE PROCESSOR     *  00580000
*                             PARAMETERS/VPSS ALGORITHM BUILD MASKS  *  00600000
*                  (5) APOTNM - VPSS MODULE NAME TABLE               *  00620000
*                             THIS TABLE CONTAINS THE NAMES OF VPSS  *  00640000
*                             MODULES TO BE LOADED AND THE APCT      *  00660000
*                             OFFSET WHERE THE LOADED MODULE'S       *  00680000
*                             ADDRESS IS TO BE PLACED.               *  00700000
*                  (6) APOTVT - VPSS SUBSYSTEM VECTOR TABLE          *  00720000
*                             SSVT INITIALIZATION PARAMETERS.        *  00740000
*                  (7) APOTAD - APCT RELOCATION TABLE                *  00760000
*                             USED TO MODIFY THE APCT INTERNAL       *  00780000
*                             POINTERS.                              *  00800000
*                                                                    *  00820000
*      THE FUNCTION AND METHOD OF CHANGE FOR EACH TABLE IS EXPLAINED *  00840000
*     IN THE PROLOGUE TO EACH MACRO DEFINITION.                      *  00860000
*                                                                    *  00880000
**********************************************************************  00900000
         EJECT                                                          00920000
**********************************************************************  00940000
*                                                                    *  00960000
*                   IGT0VPSS INTERNAL MACROS.                        *  00980000
*                                                                    *  01000000
*        THE FOLLOWING MACROS ARE USED INTERNALLY TO GENERATE        *  01020000
*        PORTIONS OF IGT0VPSS. THE EXPLANATION PRECEDING EACH        *  01040000
*        MACRO DEFINITION INDICATES THE FUNCTION AND USE OF THE      *  01060000
*        MACRO.                                                      *  01080000
*                                                                    *  01100000
**********************************************************************  01120000
         EJECT                                                          01140000
**********************************************************************  01160000
*                                                                    *  01180000
*                       IGT0APCT MACRO                               *  01200000
*                                                                    *  01220000
*         FUNCTION - THIS MACRO IS USED TO CHANGE VALUES IN THE      *  01240000
*                    APCT. INVOCATIONS OF THIS MACRO MUST FOLLOW     *  01260000
*                    THE GENERATION OF THE APCT BY THE VPSS MACRO    *  01280000
*                    IGTXAPCT. THIS MACRO ORGS TO THE SPECIFIED      *  01300000
*                    APCT LABEL AND REDEFINES THE DATA AT THAT       *  01320000
*                    LABEL.                                          *  01340000
*        MACRO INVOCATION -                                          *  01360000
*                   APCTLBL  IGT0APCT APCTNVAL                       *  01380000
*                   WHERE APCTLBL IS THE LAST 1-4 CHARACTERS(FOLLOW- *  01400000
*                   THE CHARACTERS APCT) OF THE LABEL IN APCT FOR    *  01420000
*                   WHICH THE CHANGE IS TO BE MADE                   *  01440000
*                   AND APCTNVAL IS THE REPLACEMENT VALUE.           *  01460000
*                   THIS VALUE MUST HAVE THE SAME LENGTH ATTRIBUTE   *  01480000
*                   AS THE VALUE IT REPLACES.                        *  01500000
*        EXAMPLE OF USE -                                            *  01520000
*                   TO CHANGE THE SUBSYSTEM NAME TO XXXX, THE        *  01540000
*                   FOLLOWING MACRO INVOCATION WOULD FOLLOW THE      *  01560000
*                   GENERATION OF THE APCT:                          *  01580000
*                   SSID   IGT0APCT   CL4'XXXX'                      *  01600000
*                                                                    *  01620000
**********************************************************************  01640000
         SPACE 5                                                        01660000
         MACRO                     IGT0APCT                             01680000
&APCTLBL IGT0APCT &APCTVAL         APCT CHANGE MACR0                    01700000
.*                                                                      01720000
.** THIS MACRO IS USED TO CHANGE VALUES IN THE APCT. THIS IS            01740000
.** ACCOMPLISHED BY 'ORG'ING TO THE SPECIFIED APCT LABEL AND            01760000
.**'DC'ING A NEW VALUE AT THAT LABEL.                                   01780000
.** INPUT ---                                                           01800000
.**          &APCTLBL  - THE LAST 1-4 CHARACTERS(FOLLOWING THE          01820000
.**                      CHARACTERS 'APCT') OF THE APCT LABEL FOR WHICH 01840000
.**                      THE CHANGE IS TO BE MADE.                      01860000
.**          &APCTVAL  - THE NEW VALUE TO BE INSERTED AT THE LOCATION   01880000
.**                      SPECIFIED BY &APCTLBL.                         01900000
.*                                                                      01920000
         LCLA  &LNP                HOLDS LENGTH OF &APCTLBL PARAMETER   01940000
&LNP     SETA  K'&APCTLBL          GET NUMBER OF CHARACTERS IN          01960000
.*                                 &APCTLBL PARAMETER                   01980000
         AIF   (&LNP LT 1 OR &LNP GT 4).BADLBL                          02000000
.*                                 .BADLBL IF NUMBER OF CHARACTERS IS   02020000
.*                                 ZERO OR GT 5                         02040000
         ORG   APCT&APCTLBL        ORG TO DESIRED APCT LOCATION         02060000
         DC    &APCTVAL            DEFINE NEW APCT VALUE                02080000
         AGO   .APCTOVR            CHANGE IS MADE - GO TO .APCTOVR      02100000
.BADLBL  ANOP  ,                   &APCTLBL IS BAD - ISSUE ERROR MSG.   02120000
         IGTXMERR ERRN=1,KEYWORD=APCTLBL,ERRLVL=8,VALUE=&APCTLBL        02140000
.APCTOVR ANOP  ,                                                        02160000
         ORG   ,                                                        02180000
         MEND                                                           02200000
         EJECT                                                          02220000
*********************************************************************** 02240000
*                                                                     * 02260000
*                          IGT0MNT MACRO                              * 02280000
*                                                                     * 02300000
*           FUNCTION - THIS MACRO IS USED TO GENERATE APOTNM ENTRIES  * 02320000
*                      WHICH TELL VPSS WHICH MODULES TO LOAD.         * 02340000
*                      SEE THE APOTNM DSECT WITHIN IGTXAPOT FOR       * 02360000
*                      APOTNM FORMAT.                                 * 02380000
*                                                                     * 02400000
*           MACRO INVOCATION -                                        * 02420000
*                                                                     * 02440000
*           LABEL   IGT0MNT SUFFIX,TYPE,SUNBR,LOAD,SYST=,FIX=,NAME=   * 02460000
*                                                                     * 02480000
*                      WHERE:                                         * 02500000
*                           LABEL - LABEL DESIRED FOR THIS APOTNM     * 02520000
*                                   ENTRY. IF OMITTED, A LABEL OF THE * 02540000
*                                   FORM IGTT(TYPE)(SUFFIX) IS        * 02560000
*                           SUFFIX- MODULE SUFFIX(REQUIRED PARAMETER) * 02580000
*                           TYPE  - MODULE TYPE(REQUIRED PARAMETER)   * 02600000
*                                   = Z - VPSS ROUTINE.               * 02620000
*                                   = @ - USER EXIT ROUTINE.          * 02640000
*                           SUNBR - SU NUMBER FOR THIS MODULE(IF      * 02660000
*                                   APPLICABLE)                       * 02670000
*                           LOAD  - MODULE LOAD FLAG(REQUIRED ONLY IF * 02680000
*                                   SUNBR APPLIES.                    * 02690000
*                                   = YES - IF SUNBR APPLID - LOAD    * 02700000
*                                   THIS MODULE.                      * 02720000
*                                   = NO  - IF SUNBR APPLIED - DO NOT * 02740000
*                                   LOAD THIS MODULE.                 * 02760000
*                           SYST= - KEYWORD PARAMETER USED TO SPECIFY * 02762000
*                                   FOR WHICH SYSTEM MODULE APPLIES.  * 02764000
*                                   = VS1 - LOAD THIS MODULE FOR VS1  * 02766000
*                                           ONLY.                     * 02768000
*                                   = MVS - LOAD THIS MODULE FOR MVS  * 02770000
*                                           ONLY.                     * 02772000
*                                   = ALL(DEFAULT) - LOAD THIS MODULE * 02774000
*                                           FOR MVS AND VS1.          * 02776000
*                           FIX=  - KEYWORD PARAMETER USED TO SPECIFY * 02776400
*                                   IF A MODULE IS TO BE PERMANENTLY  * 02776800
*                                   FIXED.                            * 02777200
*                                   = YES - FIX MODULE.               * 02777600
*                                   = NO(DEFAULT) - DO NOT FIX MODULE.* 02778000
*                           NAME= - KEYWORD PARAMETER USED TO         * 02778400
*                                   GENERATE MODULE NAME IF STAN-     * 02778800
*                                   DARD NAME OF IGT(SUFFIX) IS NOT   * 02779200
*                                   TO BE USED.                       * 02779600
*           EXAMPLE OF USE   - TO GENERATE AN APOTNM ENTRY FOR USER   * 02780000
*                              EXIT MODULE IGTXXX, APPLIED FOR SU     * 02800000
*                              NUMBER 99 WITH LOAD = YES, APPLICABLE  * 02820000
*                              TO MVS AND VS1 AND LABELED LABXXX, THE * 02830000
*                              FOLLOWING MACRO STATEMENT WOULD BE     * 02840000
*                              USED:                                  * 02850000
*                                                                     * 02880000
*           LABXXX  IGT0MNT XXX,@,99,YES                              * 02900000
*                                                                     * 02920000
*********************************************************************** 02940000
         SPACE 5                                                        02960000
         MACRO                          IGT0MNT                         02980000
&NMLBL   IGT0MNT &SUFFIX,&TYPE,&SUNBR,&LOAD,&SYST=ALL,&FIX=NO,&NAME=    03000000
.*                                      GENERATE APOTNMT ENTRY          03010000
.*                                                                      03020000
.** THIS MACRO IS USED TO GENERATE APOTNMT ENTRIES. FIRST, THE SYST     03040000
.** KEYWORD IS CHECKED AGAINST THE SYSTEM BEING USED(FROM IGTXSYSA).    03046000
.** IF THE SYSTEM DOES NOT MATCH, THIS MACRO EXITS. OTHERWISE, AN 8     03052000
.** CHARACTER NAME IS DEFINED VIA 'DC'. THE NAME IS OF THE FORM         03060000
.** IGT(SUFFIX) UNLESS A MODULE NAME HAS BEEN SUPPLIED VIA THE NAME     03080000
.** KEYWORD. NEXT, USING THE TYPE PARAMETER, THE APCT OFFSET IS         03090000
.** DETERMINED AND PLACED INTO A HALFWORD LOCATION. THE NEXT TWO        03100000
.** BYTES ARE CONFIGURED ACCORDING TO THE LOAD PARAMETER. AND THE       03120000
.** LAST HALFWORD IS FILLED WITH THE APPLICABLE SU NUMBER, IF ANY.      03140000
.** THE ENTRY LABEL IS THE USER'S IF SUPPLIED. OTHERWISE, THIS MACRO    03160000
.** GENERATES A LABEL OF THE FORM IGTT(TYPE)(SUFFIX).                   03180000
.** INPUT ---                                                           03200000
.**          &NMLBL    - DESIRED ENTRY LABEL OR BLANK IF THIS MACRO IS  03220000
.**                      TO GENERATE LABEL.                             03240000
.**          &SUFFIX   - SUFFIX OF MODULE TO BE LOADED.(MODULE NAME     03260000
.**                      WITHOUT CHARACTERS'IGT').                      03280000
.**          &TYPE     - MODULE TYPE.                                   03300000
.**                      = Z - VPSS ROUTINE.                            03320000
.**                      = @ - APCP ROUTINE POINTER.                    03340000
.**          &SUNBR    - SU NUMBER FOR THIS MODULE, IF APPLICABLE.      03360000
.**          &LOAD     - MODULE LOAD FLAG(APPLICABLE ONLY IF SUNBR      03380000
.**                      USED).                                         03400000
.**                      = YES - IF SUNBR APPLIED - LOAD                03420000
.**                        THIS MODULE.                                 03440000
.**                      = NO  - IF SUNBR APPLIED - DO NOT              03460000
.**                        LOAD THIS MODULE.                            03480000
.**          &SYST    - SYSTEM FLAG.                                    03482000
.**                     = VS1 - VS1 ONLY MODULE.                        03484000
.**                     = MVS - MVS ONLY MODULE.                        03486000
.**                     = ALL(DEFAULT) - MVS AND VS1 MODULE.            03488000
.**          &FIX     - MODULE FIX FLAG.                                03490000
.**                     = YES - FIX MODULE.                             03492000
.**                     = NO  - DO NOT FIX MODULE.                      03494000
.**          &NAME    - MODULE NAME. USED IF MODULE NAME TO             03500000
.**                     BE OTHER THAN THE STANDARD FORM OF              03505000
.**                     IGT(SUFFIX).                                    03510000
.*                                                                      03515000
         COPY  IGTXSYSA                 GET SYSTEM NAME/LEVEL           03520000
         AIF   ('&SYST' EQ 'ALL').DONM  .DONM IF FOR MVS AND VS1        03521000
         AIF   ('&SYST' EQ 'VS1').CKVS1 .CKVS1 IF SYST=VS1              03522000
         AIF   ('&SYST' NE 'MVS').SYSER .SYSER IF SYST NE MVS/VS1/ALL   03523000
.*                                                                      03524000
.**                                     MODULE IS FOR MVS ONLY          03525000
.*                                                                      03526000
         AIF   ('&VPSSSYS' EQ 'MVS').DONM  .DONM IF THIS IS MVS SYSTEM  03527000
         MEXIT                          IGNORE THIS REQUEST IF NOT MVS  03528000
.CKVS1   AIF   ('&VPSSSYS' EQ 'VS1').DONM  .DONM IF THIS IS VS1 SYSTEM  03529000
         MEXIT                          IGNORE THIS REQUEST IF NOT VS1  03530000
.DONM    AIF   ('&SUFFIX' EQ ' ').NOSUF .NOSUF IF SUFFIX OMITTED        03531000
         AIF   ('&TYPE' EQ '').NOTYPE   .NOTYPE IF TYPE OMITTED         03540000
         AIF   ('&FIX' EQ 'YES' OR '&FIX' EQ 'NO').FXOK                 03560000
.*                                      VALIDATE FIX PARAMETER          03563000
         IGTXMERR ERRN=1,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=FIX,VALUE=&FIX,             *03566000
               RANGE=(YES,NO)           ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MSG IF FIX   03569000
         MEXIT                          PARM BAD AND EXIT               03572000
.FXOK    AIF   ('&SUNBR' EQ '' AND '&LOAD' NE '').NOSUNB                03575000
.*                                      .NOSUNB IF LOAD SPECIFIED BUT   03580000
.*                                      SUNBR NOT SPECIFIED             03600000
         AIF   ('&LOAD' EQ '' AND '&SUNBR' NE '').NOLOAD                03620000
.*                                      .NOLOAD IF SUNBR SPECIFIED BUT  03640000
.*                                      LOAD NOT SPECIFIED              03660000
         AIF   ('&LOAD' EQ '').LDCK     .LDCK IF LOAD DOES NOT NEED     03680000
.*                                      VALIDITY CHECK                  03700000
         AIF   ('&LOAD' EQ 'YES' OR '&LOAD' EQ 'NO').LDCK               03720000
.*                                      .LDCK IF LOAD OK                03740000
         IGTXMERR ERRN=1,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=LOAD,VALUE=&LOAD,           *03760000
               RANGE=(YES,NO)           ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MESSAGE      03780000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        03800000
.LDCK    ANOP  ,                        ALL PARAMETERS CHECKED          03820000
.* DEFINE THE MODULE NAME                                               03840000
         AIF   ('&NMLBL' NE  '').LBLGVN .LBLGVN IF LABEL SUPPLIED       03860000
         AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').NONMLB   .NONMLB IF NAME NOT SUPPLIED    03864000
IGTT&TYPE&SUFFIX DC CL8'&NAME'          APOTNMLD                        03868000
         AGO   .OFFSET                  .OFFSET W/ MY LABEL,USER NAME   03872000
.NONMLB  ANOP  ,                        NO USER LABEL OR NAME           03876000
IGTT&TYPE&SUFFIX DC CL8'IGT&SUFFIX' APOTNMLD                            03880000
         AGO   .OFFSET                  GIVE IT A LABEL - GO TO .OFFSE  03900000
.LBLGVN  AIF   ('&NAME' EQ '').LBNONM   .LBNONM IF NAME NOT SUPPLIED    03920000
&NMLBL   DC CL8'&NAME'                  APOTNMLD                        03925000
         AGO   .OFFSET                  .OFFSET MY NAME,MY LABEL        03930000
.LBNONM  ANOP  ,                        NO USER LABEL,USER NAME         03935000
&NMLBL   DC    CL8'IGT&SUFFIX'          APOTNMLD                        03940000
.OFFSET  ANOP  ,                        MODULE NAME DEFINED             03960000
         AIF   ('&TYPE' EQ 'Z').TYPEZ   .TYPEZ IF TYPE = Z              03980000
         AIF   ('&TYPE' EQ '@').TYPE@   .TYPE@ IF TYPE = @              04000000
.* DEFINED APCT OFFSET FOR NON-Z OR NON-@ TYPE ROUTINES                 04020000
         DC    Y(APCT&TYPE&SUFFIX-APCT) APOTNMOF                        04040000
         AGO   .FLAGS                   OFFSET DEFINED                  04060000
.TYPEZ   ANOP  ,                                                        04080000
.* DEFINE Z-TYPE APCT OFFSET                                            04100000
         DC    Y(APCTZ&SUFFIX-APCT)     APOTNMOF                        04120000
         AGO   .FLAGS                   Z-TYPE OFFSET DEFINED           04140000
.TYPE@   ANOP  ,                                                        04160000
.* DEFINE @-TYPE APCT OFFSET                                            04180000
         DC    Y(@&SUFFIX-APCT)         APOTNMLD                        04200000
.FLAGS   ANOP  ,                                                        04220000
         AIF   ('&SUNBR' EQ '').NOSULD  .NOSULD IF NO SUNBR             04240000
         AIF   ('&LOAD' EQ 'YES').YESL  .YESL IF LOAD = YES             04260000
         AIF   ('&FIX' EQ 'YES').NOLDFX .NOLDFX IF FIX=YES              04280000
         DC    X'20'                    APOTNMF0                        04286000
         AGO   .SU                      .SU WITH LOAD=NO,FIX=NO         04292000
.NOLDFX  DC    X'A0'                    APOTNMF0                        04298000
         AGO   .SU                      .SU WITH LOAD=NO,FIX=YES        04304000
.YESL    AIF   ('&FIX' EQ 'YES').LDFX   .LDFX IF FIX=YES                04310000
         DC    X'40'                    APOTNMF0                        04316000
         AGO   .SU                      .SU WITH LOAD=YES,FIX=NO        04322000
.LDFX    DC    X'C0'                    APOTNMF0                        04328000
.SU      DC    AL1(&SUNBR)              APOTNMSU                        04340000
         AGO   .NMDONE                                                  04360000
.NOSULD  AIF   ('&FIX' EQ 'YES').FX     .FX IF FIX=YES                  04380000
         DC    X'00'                    APOTNMF0                        04386000
         AGO   .DONMSU                  .DONMSU WITH FIX=NO             04392000
.FX      DC    X'80'                    APOTNMF0                        04398000
.DONMSU  ANOP  ,                        FINISH NO SU PATH               04404000
         DC    AL1(0)                   APOTNMSU                        04410000
         AGO   .NMDONE                                                  04420000
.NOSUF   IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SUFFIX                       04440000
.*                                      SUFFIX MISSING - ISSUE ERR MSG  04460000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        04480000
.NOTYPE  IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=TYPE                         04500000
.*                                      TYPE MISSING - ISSUE ERR MSG    04520000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        04540000
.NOSUNB  IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SUNBR                        04560000
.*                                      SUNBR MISSING - ISSUE ERR MSG   04580000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        04600000
.NOLOAD  IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=LOAD,RANGE=(YES,NO)          04620000
.*                                      LOAD MISSING - ISSUE ERR MSG    04640000
.*                                      AND EXIT                        04660000
.NMDONE  MEXIT                                                          04680000
.SYSER   IGTXMERR ERRN=1,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SYST,VALUE=&SYST             04685000
.*                                      ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MESSAGE      04690000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        04695000
         MEND                                                           04700000
       EJECT                                                            04720000
*********************************************************************** 04740000
*                                                                     * 04760000
*                        IGT0CTRT MACRO                               * 04780000
*                                                                     * 04800000
*            FUNCTION - THIS MACRO IS USED TO GENERATE THE SKELETON   * 04820000
*                       APCT RELOCATION TABLE - APOTAD.               * 04840000
*            METHOD OF INVOCATION -                                   * 04860000
*                                                                     * 04880000
*                   LABEL    IGT0CTRT &SUFFIX,&CTRTLN                 * 04900000
*            WHERE:                                                   * 04920000
*                   &SUFFIX    - APCT SUFFIX OF RELOCATION TABLE      * 04940000
*                   &CTRTLN    - NUMBER OF ENTRIES TO GENERATE        * 04960000
*            EXAMPLE OF USE - TO GENERATE 100 APOTAD ENTRIES AT APCT  * 04980000
*                       RELOCATION TABLE U@@@, THE FOLLOWING MACRO    * 05000000
*                       STATEMENT WOULD BE USED:                        05020000
*                                                                     * 05040000
*            LABEL   IGT0CTRT U@@@,100                                  05060000
*                                                                     * 05080000
*********************************************************************** 05100000
       SPACE 5                                                          05120000
       MACRO                        IGT0CTRT                            05140000
&CTRTLBL IGT0CTRT &SUFFIX,&CTRTLN   GENERATE THE APCT RELOCATION TABLE  05160000
.*                                                                      05180000
.** THIS MACRO IS USED TO GENERATE THE APOTAD TABLE. CTRTLN HALFWORD    05200000
.** APOTAD ENTRIES ARE GENERATED FOR APCT(SUFFIX).                      05220000
.*                                                                      05240000
       LCLA  &CTR                   HOLDS &CTRTLN FOR LOOP CONTROL      05260000
       LCLA  &OFF                   HOLDS APCT OFFSETS                  05280000
       AIF   ('&SUFFIX' EQ '').NOSUF                                    05300000
.*                                  .NOSUF IF APCT SUFFIX OMITTED       05320000
       AIF   ('&CTRTLN' EQ '').NOCTL                                    05340000
.*                                  .NOCTL IF CTRTLN OMITTED            05360000
&CTR   SETA  &CTRTLN                GET NUMBER OF ENTRIES TO GENERATE   05380000
&OFF   SETA  0                      START AT OFFSET ZERO                05400000
.* GENERATE AN APOTAD ENTRY                                             05420000
.ADLOOP DC    AL2(APCT&SUFFIX+&OFF-APCT)  APOTADOF                      05440000
&CTR   SETA  &CTR-1                 DECREMENT COUNTER                   05460000
&OFF   SETA  &OFF+4                 BUMP APCT OFFSET BY 4 BYTES         05480000
       AIF   (&CTR GT 0).ADLOOP     LOOP TILL ALL DONE                  05500000
       AGO   .ADDONE                APOTAD GENERATED                    05520000
.* HANDLE IGT0CTRT ERRORS. ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MESSAGE AND EXIT.         05540000
.NOSUF IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SUFFIX                         05560000
.*                                  SUFFIX OMITTED                      05580000
       MEXIT                        EXIT - NO APOTAD ENTRIES CREATED    05600000
.NOCTL IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=CTRTLN                         05620000
.*                                  CTRTLN OMITTED                      05640000
       MEXIT                        EXIT - NO APOTAD ENTRIES CREATED    05660000
.ADDONE MEND                        END OF IGT0CTRT PROCESSING          05680000
       EJECT                                                            05700000
*********************************************************************** 05720000
*                                                                     * 05740000
*                           IGT0SSVT MACRO                            * 05760000
*                                                                     * 05780000
*            FUNCTION - THIS MACRO IS USED TO GENERATE APOTVT         * 05800000
*  ENTRIES IN THE FORMAT DESCRIBED IN THE APOTVT DSECT WITHIN         * 05820000
*  IGTXAPOT.                                                          * 05840000
*                                                                     * 05860000
*            METHOD OF INVOCATION -                                   * 05880000
*            SSVTLBL IGT0SSVT &MFB,&ACTIVAT,&SUFFIX,&SYSTM=           * 05900000
*            WHERE:                                                   * 05920000
*                 SSVTLBL  - LABEL DESIRED AT GENERATED ENTRY         * 05940000
*                 &MFB     - MATRIX FUNCTION BYTE                     * 05960000
*                            = 0   THE FUNCTION SPECIFIED IN THE SSOB * 05980000
*                                  IS NOT SUPPORTED BY THIS SYSTEM    * 06000000
*                            Â¬ 0   THE VALUE (FUNCTION BYTE -1)*4     * 06020000
*                                  IS ADDED TO THE ADDRESS OF THE     * 06040000
*                                  SSVTFRTN TO OBTAIN THE ADDRESS     * 06060000
*                                  OF THE WORD CONTAININING THE       * 06080000
*                                  FUNCTION ROUTINE POINTER FOR THIS  * 06100000
*                                  REQUEST.                           * 06120000
*                 &ACTIVAT -                                          * 06140000
*                            = S   FUNCTION IS TO BE ACTIVATED BY     * 06160000
*                                  SUBSYSTEM STARTUP.                 * 06180000
*                            = M   FUNCTION IS TO BE ACTIVATED BY     * 06200000
*                                  MONITOR INITIALIZATION.            * 06220000
*                 &SUFFIX  - MODULE SUFFIX - USED TO DETERMINE OFFSET * 06240000
*                            WITHIN APCT OF THE REQUIRED MODULE.      * 06260000
*                  &SYSTM=  - KEYWORD PARAMETER USED TO SPECIFY FOR   * 06262000
*                             WHICH SYSTEM(MVS,VS1 OR BOTH) THE SSVT  * 06264000
*                             ENTRY IS TO BE GENERATED.               * 06266000
*                             = MVS - GENERATE FOR MVS ONLY.          * 06268000
*                             = VS1 - GENERATE FOR VS1 ONLY.          * 06270000
*                             = ALL(DEFAULT) - GENERATE FOR VS1 & MVS * 06272000
*                                                                     * 06280000
*********************************************************************** 06300000
       SPACE 5                                                          06320000
       MACRO                                   IGT0SSVT                 06340000
&SSVTLBL IGT0SSVT &MFB,&ACTIVAT,&SUFFIX,&SYSTM=ALL   GENERATE APOTVT    06360000
.*                                                   ENTRY              06362000
         COPY  IGTXSYSA                 GET SYSTEM NAME/LEVEL           06364000
         AIF   ('&SYSTM' EQ 'ALL').DOVT .DOVT IF FOR VS1 AND MVS        06366000
         AIF   ('&SYSTM' EQ 'VS1').CKVS1 .CKVS1 IF SYSTM=VS1            06368000
         AIF   ('&SYSTM' NE 'MVS').BADSYS .BADSYS IF ILLEGAL SYSTM VAL  06370000
.*                                                                      06372000
.**                                     SSVT ENTRY TO BE GENERATED FOR  06374000
.**                                     MVS ONLY                        06376000
.*                                                                      06378000
         AIF   ('&VPSSSYS' EQ 'MVS').DOVT .DOVT IF THIS IS MVS SYSTEM   06380000
         MEXIT                          NO SSVT ENTRY IF THIS IS VS1    06382000
.CKVS1   ANOP  ,                        GENERATE SSVT IF THIS IS VS1    06384000
         AIF   ('&VPSSSYS' EQ 'VS1').DOVT .DOVT IF THIS IS VS1 SYSTEM   06386000
         MEXIT                          NO SSVT ENTRY IF THIS IS MVS    06388000
.DOVT    AIF   ('&MFB' EQ ' ').NOMFB   .NOMFB IF MATRIX FUNCTION        06390000
.*                                        BYTE OMITTED                  06400000
       AIF   ('&ACTIVAT' EQ '').NOACT     .NOACT IF ACTIVATE FLAG       06420000
.*                                        OMITTED                       06440000
       AIF   ('&SUFFIX' EQ '').NOSUF      .NOSUF IF SUFFIX OMITTED      06460000
       AIF   ('&ACTIVAT' EQ 'S').GDACT    .GDACT IF ACTIVAT=S           06480000
       AIF   ('&ACTIVAT' NE 'M').BADACT   .BADACT IF ACTIVAT INVALID    06500000
.GDACT ANOP  ,                            ACTIVAT VALID HERE            06520000
.* DEFINE THE MATRIX FUNCTION BYTE                                      06540000
&SSVTLBL DC    AL1(&MFB)                  APOTVTCD                      06560000
       AIF   ('&ACTIVAT' EQ 'S').STARTUP  .STARTUP IF ACTIVAT=S         06580000
.* DEFINE THE ACTIVATE FLAG AS MONITOR.                                 06600000
       DC    X'40'                        APOTVTIT                      06620000
       AGO   .DOOF                        .DOOF                         06640000
.STARTUP DC  X'80'                        APOTVTIT                      06660000
.* USE SUFFIX TO DEFINE OFFSET WITHIN APCT OF ADDRESS OF                06680000
.* REQUIRED MODULE.                                                     06700000
.DOOF  DC    Y(APCTZ&SUFFIX-APCT)         APOTVTOF                      06720000
       AGO   .SSVTDUN                     THAT'S ALL                    06740000
.* HANDLE IGT0SSVT ERRORS. ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MESSAGE AND EXIT.         06760000
.NOMFB IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=MFB                            06780000
.*                                        MFB OMITTED                   06800000
       MEXIT                                                            06820000
.NOACT IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=ACTIVAT                        06840000
.*                                        ACTIVAT OMITTED               06860000
       MEXIT                                                            06880000
.NOSUF IGTXMERR ERRN=2,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SUFFIX                         06900000
.*                                        SUFFIX OMITTED                06920000
       MEXIT                                                            06940000
.BADACT IGTXMERR ERRN=1,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=ACTIVAT,VALUE=&ACTIVAT,      *06960000
               RANGE=(S,M)                ACTIVAT INVALID               06980000
       MEXIT                                                            07000000
.BADSYS  IGTXMERR ERRN=1,ERRLVL=12,KEYWORD=SYSTM,VALUE=&SYSTM           07005000
.*                                      ISSUE SEVERE ERROR MESSAGE      07010000
         MEXIT                          AND EXIT                        07015000
.SSVTDUN MEND                             END IGT0SSVT PROCESSING       07020000
       EJECT                                                            07040000
*********************************************************************** 07060000
*                   END OF IGT0VPSS INTERNAL MACROS                   * 07080000
*********************************************************************** 07100000
       EJECT                                                            07120000

       EJECT                                                            07260000
*********************************************************************** 07280000
*                                                                     * 07300000
*                         IGTXAPOT                                    * 07320000
* LIST THE DSECT APOT. THIS WILL BE FOLLOWED BY THE ACTUAL VALUES FOR * 07340000
* THE APOT.                                                           * 07360000
*                                                                     * 07380000
*********************************************************************** 07400000
       SPACE 5                                                          07420000
       IGTXAPOT LIST=YES               LIST THE APOT DSECT              07440000
       SPACE 5                                                          07460000
*********************************************************************** 07480000
*                                                                     * 07500000
*                       APOT DATA TABLE                               * 07520000
*                                                                     * 07540000
*      THE FOLLOWING TABLE IS THE ACTUAL BEGINNING OF THE IGT0VPSS    * 07560000
* DATA SET AND CONTAINS APOT DATA IN THE FORMAT DESCRIBED IN THE      * 07580000
* APOT DSECT WITHIN IGTXAPOT. THIS PORTION OF THE TABLE CONTAINS      * 07600000
* POINTERS TO THE OTHER APOT TABLES. REFER TO THE APOT DSECT WHEN IN- * 07620000
* TERPRETING THIS TABLE. THE COMMENTS FIELD OF EACH FOLLOWING APOT    * 07640000
* DATA DEFINITION INDICATES THE IGTXAPOT LABEL FOR THAT VALUE.        * 07660000
* THIS SECTION OF APOT SHOULD NOT BE CHANGED UNLESS THE IGTXAPOT IS   * 07680000
* REDEFINED.                                                          * 07700000
*      NOTE THAT VALUES IN THIS TABLE ARE ONLY FOR THE APOT DSECT     * 07720000
* WITHIN IGTXAPOT. VALUES FOR THE DSECTS APOTNM, APOTVT AND APOTAD    * 07740000
* ARE GIVEN LATER ON WITHIN IGT0VPSS.                                 * 07760000
*                                                                     * 07780000
*********************************************************************** 07800000
       SPACE 5                                                          07820000
IGT0VPSS CSECT                         VPSS OPTIONS TABLE               07840000
       DS    0F                        APOT                             07860000
       DC    CL4'APOT'                 APOTID                           07880000
       DC    A(*-*)                    APOTUSER                         07900000
       DC    A(APCT)                   APOTCTAD - ADDRESS OF APCT       07920000
       DC    A(APCTEND-APCT)           APOTCTLN - LENGTH OF APCT        07940000
       DC    A(MNT)                    APOTNMAD - ADDRESS OF APOTNM -   07960000
*                                                 MODULE NAME TABLE     07980000
       DC    A(MNT#)                   APOTNMCT - NUMBER OF APOTNM      08000000
*                                                 ENTRIES               08020000
       DC    A(SSVTFT)                 APOTVTAD - ADDRESS OF APOTVT -   08040000
*                                                 SUBSYSTEM VECTOR      08060000
*                                                 TABLE(SSVT)           08080000
       DC    A(SSVT#)                  APOTVTCT - NUMBER OF SSVT        08100000
*                                                 ENTRIES               08120000
       DC    A(APCTRT)                 APOTADAD - ADDRESS OF APCT       08140000
*                                                 RELOCATION TABLE      08160000
       DC    A(APCTRT#)                APOTADCT - NUMBER OF APCT        08180000
*                                      RELOCATION TABLE ENTRIES         08200000
       DC    A(APCTBR14-APCT)          APOTBR14                         08220000
       DC    A(CAPCP)                  APOTCPAD                         08240000
       DC    A(2+(CAPCPZ-CAPCP-APCPLN0)/APCPLN1) APOTCPCT               08260000
       DC    A(APCPLN0)                APOTCPPL                         08280000
       DC    A(APCPLN1)                APOTCPLN                         08300000
       DS    0D                                                         08320000
*********************************************************************** 08340000
*                                                                     * 08360000
*                     END OF APOT DATA TABLE                          * 08380000
*                                                                     * 08400000
*********************************************************************** 08420000
       EJECT                                                            08440000
*********************************************************************** 08460000
*                                                                     * 08480000
*                          APCT DATA TABLE                            * 08500000
*                                                                     * 08520000
*      THE APCT DATA TABLE IS GENERATED BY USING THE CSECT OPTION     * 08540000
* (DSECT=NO) ON THE MACRO INVOCATION IGTXAPCT. REFER TO THE COMMENTS  * 08560000
* IN THE EXPANDED IGTXAPCT FOR INTERPRETATION OF THE APCT. IF A       * 08580000
* CHANGE IS DESIRED TO THE APCT, USE THE INTERNAL MACRO IGT0APCT      * 08600000
* TO EFFECT CHANGES. REFER TO THE IGT0APCT MACRO FOR AN EXPLANATION   * 08620000
* OF ITS USE. CHANGES MUST BE INSERTED AFTER THE GENERATION OF THE    * 08640000
* APCT AT THE SECTION TITLED 'CHANGES TO THE APCT'.                   * 08660000
*                                                                     * 08680000
*********************************************************************** 08700000
         SPACE 5                                                        08720000
         IGTXAPCT LIST=YES,DSECT=NO    GENERATE THE APCT                08740000
ENDAPCT  EQU   *                                                        08760000
         EJECT                                                          08780000
*********************************************************************** 08800000
*                                                                     * 08820000
*                      CHANGES TO THE APCT                            * 08840000
*                                                                     * 08860000
*      CHANGES TO THE APCT ARE TO BE MADE HERE. THE INTERNAL MACRO    * 08880000
* IGT0APCT MUST BE USED TO EFFECT APCT CHANGES. REFER TO THE IGT0APCT * 08900000
* MACRO FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON ITS USE.                                  * 08920000
*                                                                     * 08940000
*********************************************************************** 08960000
         SPACE 5                                                        08980000
CRTN     IGT0APCT   A(CAPCPRTN-APCT)     DEFINE ADDR OF APCP CALL TABLE 09040000
         SPACE 5                                                        09120000
*********************************************************************** 09140000
*                                                                     * 09160000
*                      END OF APCT CHANGES                            * 09180000
*                                                                     * 09200000
*********************************************************************** 09220000
         SPACE 5                                                        09240000
*********************************************************************** 09260000
*                                                                     * 09280000
*                      END OF APCT                                    * 09300000
*                                                                     * 09320000
*********************************************************************** 09340000
         EJECT                                                          09360000
*********************************************************************** 09380000
*                                                                     * 09400000
*                    APCP ROUTINE POINTER TABLE                       * 09420000
*                                                                     * 09440000
*      THIS TABLE CONTAINS POINTERS TO ROUTINES USED IN CALL INTER-   * 09460000
* FACE PROCESSING. ENTRIES ARE REFERRED TO BY LABEL IN THE APCP       * 09480000
* DATA TABLE. AN ENTRY IN THE APCP MUST REFER TO ONE OF THES ENTRIES  * 09500000
* TO DETERMINE WHICH ROUTINE WILL PROCESS THE USER CALL. ENTRIES MUST * 09520000
* BE MADE IN THE SAME FORMAT. ENTRIES ARE CHANGED ONLY IF THE NAME OF * 09540000
* PROCESSING ROUTINE CHANGES OR A NEW ROUTINE IS ADDED TO HANDLE THE  * 09560000
* SAME CALL.                                                          * 09580000
* NOTE: THIS TABLE MUST FOLLOW THE APCT.                                09600000
*                                                                     * 09620000
*********************************************************************** 09640000
         SPACE 5                                                        09660000
CAPCPRTN DS    0A                  APCP ROUTINE POINTER TABLE           09680000
@MJB     DC    V(IGTMJB)           GENERATE ACB                         09700000
@MJC     DC    V(IGTMJC)           OPEN ACB                             09720000
@MJD     DC    V(IGTMJD)           GENERATE AND OPEN ACB                09740000
@MJE     DC    V(IGTMJE)           MODIFY ACB                           09760000
@MJF     DC    V(IGTMJF)           CLOSE ACB                            09780000
@MJG     DC    V(IGTMJG)           FREE ACB                             09800000
@MLA     DC    V(IGTMLA)           INITIAL BUILD REQUEST                09820000
@MFA     DC    V(IGTMFA)           LOGIC OPERATION CONSTRUCTION         09840000
@MDA     DC    V(IGTMDA)           ALGORITHM CONSTRUCTION               09860000
@MDB     DC    V(IGTMDB)           CHANNEL TRANSFER CONSTRUCTION        09880000
@MDC     DC    V(IGTMDC)           NTH ZERO CROSSING CONSTRUCTION       09890000
@MGA     DC    V(IGTMGA)           TRANSLATE                            09900000
@MHA     DC    V(IGTMHA)           RELEASE                              09920000
@MCA     DC    V(IGTMCA)           EXCW/EXC/WAIT ERROR PROCESSING       09940000
APCTEND  EQU   *                   END OF APCT FOR IGT0VPSS PURPOSES    09960000
*********************************************************************** 09980000
*                                                                     * 10000000
*                  END OF APCP ROUTINE POINTER TABLE                  * 10020000
*                                                                     * 10040000
*********************************************************************** 10060000
         EJECT                                                          10080000
*********************************************************************** 10100000
*                                                                     * 10120000
*                        IGTXAPCP DSECT                               * 10140000
*                                                                     * 10160000
*      LIST THE DSECT IGTXAPCP USED TO MAP VALUES IN THE APCP         * 10180000
* PORTIONS OF THE APCP/APAL DATA TABLE. REFER TO THIS DSECT WHEN      * 10200000
* INTERPRETING THE APCP ENTRIES.                                      * 10220000
*                                                                     * 10240000
*********************************************************************** 10260000
         SPACE 5                                                        10280000
         IGTXAPCP LIST=YES            LIST THE APCP DSECT               10300000
         EJECT                                                          10320000
*********************************************************************** 10340000
*                                                                     * 10360000
*                        IGTXAPAL DSECT                               * 10380000
*                                                                     * 10400000
*      LIST THE DSECT IGTXAPAL USED TO MAP VALUES IN THE APAL         * 10420000
* PORTIONS OF THE APCP/APAL DATA TABLE. REFER TO THIS DSECT WHEN      * 10440000
* INTERPRETING THE APAL ENTRIES.                                      * 10460000
*                                                                     * 10480000
*********************************************************************** 10500000
         SPACE 5                                                        10520000
         IGTXAPAL LIST=YES                                              10540000
         EJECT                                                          10560000
*********************************************************************** 10580000
*                                                                     * 10600000
*                        APCP/APAL DATA TABLE                         * 10620000
*                                                                     * 10640000
*      THE FOLLOWING TABLE CONTAINS APCP AND APAL DATA IN THE FORMAT  * 10660000
* DESCRIBED BY THE PRECEDING DSECTS IGTXAPCP AND IGTXAPAL. AN ENTRY   * 10680000
* EXISTS FOR EACH VPSS CALL. IF THE CALL IS NOT A 3838 OPERATION(VPSS * 10700000
* ONLY), CONSTANTS ARE DEFINED ONLY FOR IGTXAPCP. IF THE CALL IS A    * 10720000
* 3838 OPERATION, CONSTANTS ARE DEFINED FOR IGTXAPCP FOLLOWED BY      * 10740000
* THE CONSTANTS FOR IGTXAPAL. REFER TO THE IGTXAPCP AND IGTXAPAL      * 10760000
* DSECTS WHEN INTERPRETING THIS TABLE. THE COMMENTS FIELD OF EACH     * 10780000
* TABLE ENTRY INDICATES THE CORRESPONDING IGTXAPCP OR IGTXAPAL LABEL. * 10800000
* TO CHANGE A CONSTANT IN THIS TABLE, FIRST DETERMINE DESIRED NEW     * 10820000
* VALUE BY REFERRING TO THE APPROPRIATE DSECT. NEXT, FIND THE ENTRY   * 10840000
* IN THE APCP/APAL DATA TABLE FOR WHICH THE CHANGE IS TO BE IMPLE-    * 10860000
* MENTED. LOCATE THE CONSTANT WITHIN THE ENTRY USING THE LABEL NAMES  * 10880000
* IN THE COMMENTS FIELD OF THE ENTRY. FINALLY, MAKE THE DESIRED       * 10900000
* CHANGE, REASSEMBLE IGT0VPSS AND LINK-EDIT INTO SYS1.LOADVPSS AS     * 10920000
* IGT0VPSS. SINCE APCP/APAL DATA IS POSITIONALLY MAPPED VIA DSECT,    * 10940000
* CARE MUST BE EXERCISED IN MAINTAINING THE POSITIONAL CHARACTERIS-   * 10960000
* TICS OF THE ENTRY. A VALUE CANNOT BE DELETED - IT MUST BE CHANGED.  * 10980000
* THE LENGTHS OF THE FIELDS MAY NOT CHANGE.                           * 11000000
*                                                                     * 11020000
*********************************************************************** 11040000
         SPACE 5                                                        11060000
IGT0VPSS CSECT                         APCP/APAL DATA TABLE             11080000
*                                                                       11100000
*********************************************************************** 11120000
*                                                                     * 11140000
*                             APCP HEADER                             * 11160000
*                                                                     * 11180000
