*                         DUMMY APCP ENTRY                            * 88480000
*                                                                     * 88500000
*********************************************************************** 88520000
         DC    CL4'UNKN'           APCPAPFN                             88540000
         DC    A(0)                APCPAPOP                             88560000
         DC    A(CAPCPRTN-CAPCPRTN) APCPRTN                             88580000
         DC    F'0'                APCPUSRX                             88600000
         DC    H'99'               APCPMAXP                             88620000
         DC    H'03'               APCPMINP                             88640000
         DC    XL4'00000000'       RESERVED                             88660000
         DC    XL8'0000000000000000' RESERVED                           88680000
         DC    00XL16'00'          APCPSWS                              88700000

*                                                                       92061000

*                                                                       92064000
         IGT0MNT MAB,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    APUT INITIALIZED                92065000
         IGT0MNT MBD,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    CALL ROUTER(BEFORE PROCESSING)  92066000
         IGT0MNT MBD,2,NAME=IGTUBR14    CALL ROUTER(AFTER PROCESSING)   92067000
         IGT0MNT CMD,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    COMMAND VERIFICATION            92068000
         IGT0MNT MBM,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    CALL EXLST ENTRY FOR ERROR EXIT 92069000
         IGT0MNT JAA,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    SUBSYSTEM OPEN EXIT(OPEN DONE)  92070000
         IGT0MNT JHC,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    OK SHARED PORT ALLOCATION       92071000
         IGT0MNT JHC,2,NAME=IGTUBR14    OK EXCLUSIVE PORT ALLOCATION    92072000
         IGT0MNT JHT,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    OK ALLOCATION OPERATOR DIALOG   92073000
         IGT0MNT JHL,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    AFTER OPTIONAL CRITERION 1      92074000
         IGT0MNT JHL,2,NAME=IGTUBR14    AFTER OPTIONAL CRITERION 2      92075000
         IGT0MNT JBJ,1,NAME=IGTUBR14    VPSS SUBSYSTEM CLOSE UPDATE SMF 92076000
MNT#   EQU   (*-MNT)/12                DETERMINE NAME TABLE LENGTH      92080000
       DC    120X'00'                  RESERVE ZAP SPACE   - CHANGE     92100000

*********************************************************************** 92280000
*                                                                     * 92300000
*                       APOTVT DSECT - SSVT                           * 92320000
*                                                                     * 92340000
*      LIST THE SSVT FORMAT - ALSO CORRESPONDS TO DSECT APOTVT        * 92360000
*  WITHIN IGTXAPOT. REFER TO THIS DSECT WHEN INTERPRETING VALUES IN   * 92380000
*  THE APOTVT TABLE.                                                  * 92400000
*                                                                     * 92420000
*********************************************************************** 92440000
         SPACE 5                                                        92460000
         IEFJSSVT ,                SSVT FORMAT                          92480000
         EJECT                                                          92500000
*********************************************************************** 92520000
*                                                                     * 92540000
*                   APOTVT - VPSS SUBSYSTEM VECTOR TABLE              * 92560000
*                                                                     * 92580000
*      THE FOLLOWING TABLE GIVES VALUES FOR THE VPSS SUBSYSTEM VECTOR * 92600000
* TABLE - MAPPED BY DSECTS APOTVT WITHIN IGTXAPOT AND THE PRECEDING   * 92620000
* SSVT DSECT. REFER TO THE DSECTS WHEN INTERPRETING THE APOTVT.       * 92640000
*      ENTRIES IN THIS TABLE ARE GENERATED VIA THE IGT0VPSS INTERNAL  * 92660000
* MACRO IGT0SSVT. USE THIS MACRO TO ADD OR CHANGE AN APOTVT ENTRY.    * 92680000
* EXPLANATION OF THE USE OF IGT0SSVT IS CONTAINED IN THE PROLOGUE TO  * 92700000
* THE IGT0VPSS MACRO.                                                 * 92720000
*                                                                     * 92740000
*********************************************************************** 92760000
       SPACE 5                                                          92780000
IGT0VPSS CSECT                         RESUME CSECT PROCESSING          92800000
SSVTFT DS    0D                        APOTVT                           92820000
       IGT0SSVT    4,M,JDJ             END OF TASK - IGTJDJ             92840000
       IGT0SSVT    7,M,JJ0             UNALLOCATION - IGTJJ0            92860000
       IGT0SSVT    8,M,JDA,SYSTM=MVS   END OF ADDR SPACE - IGTJDA       92880000
       IGT0SSVT    10,M,JFA,SYSTM=MVS  SVC CMD PROCESSOR - IGTJFA       92900000
       IGT0SSVT    16,M,JAA            OPEN - IGTJAA                    92920000
       IGT0SSVT    17,M,JBA            CLOSE - IGTJBA                   92940000
       IGT0SSVT    38,S,JI0            CONVERTER - IGTJI0               92960000
         IGT0SSVT    39,S,JH0,SYSTM=MVS  ALLOCATION - IGTJH0            92980000
         IGT0SSVT    6,S,JH0,SYSTM=VS1   ALLOCATION - IGTJH0            92986000
SSVT#  EQU   (*-SSVTFT)/4                                               93000000
       DC    10XL4'00'                 RESERVE ZAP SPACE - CHANGE SSFT# 93020000
       SPACE 5                                                          93040000
*********************************************************************** 93060000
*                                                                     * 93080000
*                          END OF APOTVT                              * 93100000
*                                                                     * 93120000
*********************************************************************** 93140000
       EJECT                                                            93160000
*********************************************************************** 93180000
*                                                                     * 93200000
*                   APOTAD - VPSS APCT RELOCATION TABLE               * 93220000
*                                                                     * 93240000
*      THIS TABLE COMPRISES THE APCT RELOCATION TABLE USED TO MODIFY  * 93260000
* THE APCT INTERNAL POINTERS. REFER TO THE DSECT APOTAD WITHIN        * 93280000
* IGTXAPOT WHEN INTERPRETING THIS TABLE. THIS TABLE IS GENERTATED     * 93300000
* VIA THE IGT0VPSS INTERNAL MACRO IGT0CTRT. USE OF THIS MACRO IS      * 93320000
* EXPLAINED IN THE PROLOGUE TO THE IGT0CTRT MACRO.                    * 93340000
*                                                                     * 93360000
*********************************************************************** 93380000
       SPACE 5                                                          93400000
APCTRT  DS    0D                       APOTAD                           93420000
        IGT0CTRT U@@@,100              GENERATE THE RELOCATION TABLE    93440000
        DC    Y(APCTABR-APCT)          POINTER TO BR14                  93460000
        DC    Y(APCTCRTN-APCT)         CALL INTERFACE ROUTINES          93480000
APCTRT# EQU   (*-APCTRT)/2             DETERMINE NUMBER OF APCTRT       93500000
*                                      ENTRIES                          93520000
        DC    10A(0)                   ZAP SPACE                        93540000
        SPACE 5                                                         93560000
*********************************************************************** 93580000
*                                                                     * 93600000
*                            END OF APOTAD                            * 93620000
*                                                                     * 93640000
*********************************************************************** 93660000
        EJECT                                                           93680000
IGT0VPSS CSECT                                                          93700000
        IGTXEPLG LIST=YES              GET EPILOGUE                     93720000
        EJECT                                                           93740000
*********************************************************************** 93760000
*                                                                     * 93780000
*                         END OF IGT0VPSS                             * 93800000
*                                                                     * 93820000
*********************************************************************** 93840000
        END   IGT0VPSS                                                  93860000
./  ADD  SSI=70920394,NAME=IGT1VPSS
TMAC     TITLE 'IGTMAC -- APUT/APAT SKELETON FOR VPSS (IGT1VPSS)'       01000000
IGTMAC   CSECT ,                                                        02000000
*/* * START OF SPECIFICATIONS ************************************** */ 03000000
*/*                                                                  */ 04000000
*/*   MODULE-NAME = IGT1VPSS (LAST FOUR CHARACTERS ARE SUBSYSTEM)    */ 05000000
*/*                                                                  */ 06000000
*/*   DESCRIPTIVE-NAME = VPSS APUT/APAT SKELETON                     */ 07000000
*/*                                                                  */ 08000000
*/*   COPYRIGHT = NONE                                               */ 09000000
*/*                                                                  */ 10000000
*/*   STATUS = RELEASE 1, MODIFICATION LEVEL 0.                      */ 11000000
*/*                                                                  */ 12000000
*/*   FUNCTION = THIS MODULE CONTAINS THE SKELETON APUT AND          */ 13000000
*/*       APAT FOR VPSS.                                             */ 14000000
*/*                                                                  */ 15000000
*/*   NOTES =                                                        */ 16000000
*/*     THIS MODULE MUST BE LINKEDITED AS SERIALLY REUSABLE WITH     */ 17000000
*/*     A NAME OF IGT1XXXX WHERE XXXX IS THE NAME OF THE ASSOCIATED  */ 18000000
*/*     SUBSYSTEM (NORMALLY VPSS).                                   */ 19000000
*/*                                                                  */ 20000000
*/*     DEPENDENCIES =                                               */ 21000000
*/*        THE APUT MUST BE THE FIRST ENTRY IN THE MODULE.           */ 22000000
*/*                                                                  */ 23000000
*/*     RESTRICTIONS =  NONE.                                        */ 24000000
*/*                                                                  */ 25000000
*/*     REGISTER-CONVENTIONS = STANDARD VPSS CONVENTIONS             */ 26000000
*/*                                                                  */ 27000000
*/*     PATCH-LABEL = APPATCH                                        */ 28000000
*/*                                                                  */ 29000000
*/*   MODULE-TYPE = CSECT                                            */ 30000000
*/*                                                                  */ 31000000
*/*     PROCESSOR = VS/2 ASSEMBLER                                   */ 32000000
*/*                                                                  */ 33000000
*/*     MODULE SIZE = SEE END OF ASSEMBLER LISTING                   */ 34000000
*/*                                                                  */ 35000000
*/*     ATTRIBUTES = REUSABLE, ONLY-LOADABLE                         */ 36000000
*/*                                                                  */ 37000000
*/*   ENTRY-POINT = IGTMAC                                           */ 38000000
*/*                                                                  */ 39000000
*/*     PURPOSE = SAME AS FUNCTION                                   */ 40000000
*/*                                                                  */ 41000000
*/*     LINKAGE = MODULE IS ONLY LOADABLE                            */ 42000000
*/*                                                                  */ 43000000
*/*     INPUT = N/A.                                                 */ 44000000
*/*                                                                  */ 45000000
*/*     OUTPUT = N/A.                                                */ 46000000
*/*                                                                  */ 47000000
*/*   EXIT-NORMAL = N/A.                                             */ 48000000
*/*                                                                  */ 49000000
*/*   EXIT-ERROR  = N/A.                                             */ 50000000
*/*                                                                  */ 51000000
*/*   EXTERNAL-REFERENCES = NONE                                     */ 52000000
*/*                                                                  */ 53000000
*/*     ROUTINES = NONE                                              */ 54000000
*/*                                                                  */ 55000000
*/*     DATA-AREAS = NONE                                            */ 56000000
*/*                                                                  */ 57000000
*/*     CONTROL-BLOCKS = NONE                                        */ 58000000
*/*                                                                  */ 59000000
*/*   TABLES =                                                       */ 60000000
*/*       THIS MODULE CONTAINS THE APUT AND APAT SKELETONS.          */ 61000000
*/*                                                                  */ 62000000
*/*   MACROS =                                                       */ 63000000
*/*       IGTXEPLG                                                   */ 64000000
*/*                                                                  */ 65000000
*/*   CHANGE-ACTIVITY = NONE                                         */ 66000000
*/*                                                                  */ 67000000
*/*   MESSAGES = NONE                                                */ 68000000
*/*                                                                  */ 69000000
*/*   ABEND-CODES = NONE                                             */ 70000000
*/*                                                                  */ 71000000
*/* * END OF SPECIFICATIONS **************************************** */ 72000000
         EJECT ,                                                        73000000
         IGTXAPUT DSECT=NO,LIST=YES GENERATE APUT                       74000000
         SPACE 3                                                        75000000
         ORG   APUTAPAT            FILL-IN APAT POINTER                 76000000
         DC    A(APAT)             POINT TO APAT -- ALSO IN THIS PGM    77000000
         ORG   ,                   RESET TO END OF APUT                 78000000
         EJECT ,                                                        79000000
         IGTXAPAT DSECT=NO,LIST=YES GENERATE APAT                       80000000
         EJECT ,                                                        81000000
         IGTXEPLG ,                PATCH AREA                           82000000
         SPACE 3                                                        83000000
         END   ,                                                        84000000
